map001.e12t002:
It's three o'clock.
We just made it!
map001.e12t006:
Besides, it's not like we arrived last!
There's still an empty chair!
map001.e12t008:
It's a new guest. 
I hope she can make it.
map001.e12t009:
More new guests?
I thought one kid was enough!
map001.e12t011:
Indeed not.
You're more like a BABY to me.\!
How old are you, 16?
map001.e12t015:
Manners, little girl. \!
Don't try to join a conversation
between the grownups when you're
less than a hundred years old.
map001.e12t018:
Right now, you're not acting
like a grown up yourself.
map001.e12t019:
Charlotte is different from you. 
She's born in a new age, and---
map001.e12t021:
Oh, Xaviera! Finally...
Welcome!
I thought you might miss it!
map001.e12t023:
I wouldn't miss your party!
And it's so nice to meet all the witches 
in this world...
map001.e12t026:
I didn't know witches were nearing 
extinction...
map001.e12t028:
Well...Apologies once again, Ladies!
Have some cookies...
map001.e12t029:
I especially made them for the party! 
I hope they'll be nice with tea...
map001.e12t030:
Ah, I forgot to introduce myself.
My name is--
map001.e12t032:
...My name is Xaviera, \.
Wait a second!
map001.e12t033: You're the witch from the other day!!
map001.e12t034:
Oh, so you know Evangeline already. 
That's great, because I was--
map001.e12t035: You were the hag that attacked me!!
map001.e12t036:
It was because you tried to burn our 
village.
map001.e12t039:
Stop smirking, Mari!
It's not funny...
map001.e12t040:
Xaviera, what did you say?
Burn the village? Why...\.HOW??
map001.e5t002:
Ah...the cookies have such weird 
colours...\!and they smell like...
foreign spices.
map001.e5t012:
What's wrong with you!
Making cookies \c[2]SPICY HOT\c[0]!!
map001.e5t013: It's not just hot, you see...
map001.e5t014:
There were all kinds of herbs and 
a lot of butter to balance the taste!
map001.e5t015:
It's my first time having something 
like this...
They're nice, and fun!
map001.e5t016:
I didn't know you couldn't take 
spicy food at all...
map001.e5t017:
There is also \c[1]seafood\c[0] flavor...
Would you like some?
map001.e5t023:
What are you doing...!
Bribed by some crazy cookies from 
a weirdo that you've never met?!
map001.e5t024:
This witch...
is a \c[2]lackey\c[0] of humans!
map001.e5t025:
You don't know ANYTHING...
She shouldn't be here at all!
This is insane!
map001.e5t026:
You...
Why don't you give it a break?
map001.e5t027:
I tried to make the party enjoyable,
but you...You're hopeless. 
Andrea, I see your \c[2]problem\c[0].
map001.e5t028:
It is a shame that there are witches 
like you...
No wonder you're extinct.
map001.e5t034: (How could a tea party become like this?)
map001.e5t038:
...I didn't want this stupid party 
from the beginning.
map001.e5t039:
It was just because you kept nagging...
Humph!
map001.e5t040:
...I'm sorry.
It doesn't seem like I fit here, either.
map001.e5t043:
Don't worry, Drea.
I'll help you.
map001.e5t044:
Go invite Xaviera again...!\.
I know you've been looking forward to 
this party for years.
map001.e5t047:
Sorry, Ladies. 
Please wait for me...
map001.e5t049: I guess the party is completely ruined...
map001.e5t050:
A messy party is a good party! 
Renee is so happy!
map001.e5t051:
Loud Evangeline is gone,
Stubborn Andrea has left, too!
map001.e5t052:
Let's have our happy, cheerful, 
delicious tea, alright?!
map001.e5t054:
This is for Andrea's tea party!
\{Hahahahaha...!
\{HAHAHAHAHA!!!

map003.move: Gather everyone in the living room?
map003.evan1001:
Humph...You are still babysitting 
this kid, Vanessa?

I didn't do it, nor do I want to 
talk to you.
map003.evan1005:

she is trying to make us as boring

was just for tea?

map003.evan1026: That's why Renee got into trouble...
map003.evan1028: I see...I know who it is now!
map003.evan1030:

and reveal the truth!
map003.evan2001:

in Andrea's place.
map003.evan2002:
You know Andrea likes humans, 
but there's something worse...
she is trying to make us as boring as them!
map003.evan2003:

ever heard?!

room.

04vane.e10t009:

04vane.e10t016:

04vane.e14t001:

maybe because she just woke up.)

Charlotte is an interesting child!
Renee wants to be Charlotte's friend!
05dining.rewalk007:
Renee had a great time with Stephanie!
Renee is everyone's good friend!
05dining.rewalk010:
I...I've never seen any witch except 
grandma, and don't have any friends...
05dining.rewalk011:
(Even at a witch party, it's not 
normal to have mazes, furious teddy 
bears, or murder cases...is it?)
05dining.rewalk012:
Grandma has brought me to a few 
human parties, but they were boring...
05dining.rewalk013:
Parties? Renee likes parties!
Andrea has a lot of toys and delicious 
food at her party! Let's have one now!
05dining.rewalk014:
Go invite more guests!
Vanessa and Renee are going to 
prepare the room!
05dining.rewalk017:
(Renee should be the one who could 
take some rest...oh right, she is the 
one that-can't-be-killed.)
05dining.rewalk018:
I've had enough for today!
Reeeeneeeeeee.....
05dining.e48t001:
It was delicious!
Ah...a long and exciting day...
05dining.vane1001:
I've had enough for today!
Reeeeneeeeeee.....
05dining.vane1003:
Well...we don't usually see 
each other every day...
05dining.vane1004:
(Right! I'm sure this can 
persuade Vanessa...)
05dining.vane1008:
This is my first time having friends,
you know...
05dining.vane1009:
Or...Don't you want to spend more 
time with us?
05dining.vane1010:
Alright...I know!
Don't look at me like that...
05dining.vane1011:
Friendship is also a great inspiration, 
isn't it?
05dining.vane1013: (It's so nice to be young, Lottie.)
05dining.vane1015:
\c[2]Time will pass\c[0] when you invite someone...
The party can't be held if it is too late!
05dining.re2002: Here are teddy bears and rabbits...
05dining.re2003:
A rabbit in a hat has three eyes and two feet,
A bear with a broom has two eyes and four feet...
05dining.re2005:
There are 16 eyes and 24 feet,
and the number of the guests is the number of the rabbits...
So...what is it?
05dining.re2011:
Two rabbits...
no, two more guests, right?
05dining.re2016:
(Though I have no idea WHO to 
invite...That was some really 
vague fortune-telling.)
05dining.re3001: Go invite the other two guests!

map006.charl:
Charlotte
The young witch who attends the tea party for the first time.
Marilyn's granddaughter.
map006.vane:
Vanessa
A gentle and kind-hearted girl, but not very brave.
She likes drawing very much.
map006.mari:
Marilyn
Charlotte's grandmother.
Cheerful, romantic and loves playing tricks.
map006.andrea:
Andrea
The party hostess, who invited everyone.
She has been a friend of Marilyn for ages.
map006.evan:
Evangeline
The beautiful but scary-looking witch.
map006.xavi:
Xaviera
A foreign witch. She seems nice and good at cooking.
map006.mira:
Mirabell
A sweet but very shy girl...
map006.Echarl:
Charlotte (Present)
Now living near a small town with her maid Amelia.
Besides an interest in potions, her new hobby is sewing.
map006.Evane:
Vanessa (Present)
Now she is a popular manga artist. Her current serial
is a shojo manga named "Magical Girl~Pumpkin!".
map006.renee:
Renee
She looks like an small child with her teddy bears,
but is actually the most dangerous one among them all.
map006.steph:
Stephanie
A silent witch who seldom talks.
Her black dress looks dignified.
map006.bear: The leader of Renee's teddy bears.
map006.rabbit: A toy rabbit with curious power.
map006.bear2: A teddy bear in Mirabell's room.
map006.Wmira:
Mirabell the witch, 
who killed her fiancee and traded her soul to become a witch.
map006.ern: Ernest, Mirabell's Fiancee when she was a human girl.
map006.save: Charlotte has saved \v[70] times in the adventure!
map006.skeleton:
Mr. Skeleton,
who considers himself the librarian of Andrea's library.
map006.irina:
Irina, Evangeline's younger sister.
She was killed by a hero when she was a teenager.
map006.Nvane2:
I wear pajamas all day if
I don't have to go out...
map006.Mcharl: Charlotte when she was mistaken for Marilyn.
map006.Emari:
Marilyn (Present)
Marilyn hasn't changed much with her smiling and
her romantic character.
map006.Eandrea:
Andrea (Present)
Holding a party to celebrate Stephanie's succesful concert.
map006.Eevan:
Evangeline (Present)
A huge fan of Stephanie.
map006.Exavi:
Xaviera (Present)
Visiting this world for Stephanie's concert!
map006.Emira:
Mirabell (Present)
She seems more cheerful now.
map006.Esteph:
Stephanie (Present)
She has become an indie rock star now...
and has fans all over (even outside) the world.
map006.snie:
Sniechek
A harmless snow monster that looks like a snowman.
The name was given by Irina.
map006.re2:
Renee(?)
She has been sleeping in the seal...
 One of her eyes was lost, and she hopes to have it back someday.

07lr.cpt1t001:
That's it...
I already know who the culprit is!
07lr.cpt1t004:
Having all of us gathered here...
Don't you dare to talk nonsense.
07lr.cpt1t007:
There's no way you can be a dependable 
witch if you don't take responsibility 
for your words!
07lr.cpt1t008:
...No problem!
My deduction won't go wrong!
07lr.cpt1t009:
But please don't be too strict 
with Charlotte...
07lr.cpt1t010:
Don't worry!
It's not a \c[2]big deal\c[0]!
Even if you make a mistake...
07lr.cpt1t011: I'll forgive you if you eat a tomato!
07lr.cpt1t014:
Nobody went in or out during 
that time...I'm sure the culprit 
is among us!
07lr.cpt1t015:
Firstly...Andrea, Xaviera, 
Cathy and Polly are...
07lr.cpt1t016:
Meow?!
It's impurssible for us to take 
a witch's soul!
07lr.cpt1t017:
And you knew Ms. Andrea and 
Ms. Xaviera were not here!
07lr.cpt1t017_1:
Miss Charlotte, please don't be the 
detective if you don't have a clue!
07lr.cpt1t018:
Ah, I mean not guilty, of course!
(They are angry with me...)
07lr.cpt1t019:
Because Andrea and Xaviera haven't 
come back, and the maids don't have 
enough power to hurt Renee.
07lr.cpt1t020: Of course, they are not guilty.
07lr.cpt1t021:
Then...Evangeline, Vanessa and 
grandma...The culprit is...
07lr.cpt1t022:
......
I knew it was totally nonsense...
a kid's detective game...
07lr.cpt1t024:
Excuse me?! How can you suspect 
your dear grandma?!
07lr.cpt1t026:
I see...
you just want to have some tomatoes, 
right?
07lr.cpt1t028:
What are you talking about?!
I said it was impossible!
07lr.cpt1t031:
So...in fact, 
nobody has suspected \c[2]me\c[0], right?
07lr.cpt1t033:
DEAD END I
    The culprit was NOT me.
07lr.cpt1t034:
Evangeline and grandma weren't here 
when it happened, and Vanessa was 
with me in her room...
07lr.cpt1t035:
Then we have...Mirabell, Stephanie, 
and Renee herself. The culprit is...!
07lr.cpt1t037:
Mira is not the culprit because she 
doesn't know that much about Renee...
You should see that if you think 
carefully about her words.
07lr.cpt1t039:
Hahaha!
Your imagination is good though!
07lr.cpt1t041:
That's right!
It was you, Stephanie!
07lr.cpt1t047:
Mirabell's own words can prove that 
she is not the culprit!
07lr.cpt1t050:
She didn't do it. 
I knew it from the beginning.
07lr.cpt1t051:
Because she thought Renee was dead, 
and mistook the paint as blood.
07lr.cpt1t052:
She wasn't even aware Renee can't 
die. How could she take her soul?
07lr.cpt1t053: Then why would I do such a thing...?
07lr.cpt1t056:
There's something unnatural about you 
that bothers me...
07lr.cpt1t059: Why is your room on the \c[2]ground floor\c[0]?
07lr.cpt1t062: What are you talking about, Charlotte?
07lr.cpt1t065:
Your room is on the ground floor 
because you are not a guest...
07lr.cpt1t066:
And of course, you are not the hostess,
either.
07lr.cpt1t068:
You attended the tea party for 
the first time 20 years ago, 
because you are...
07lr.cpt1t075:
Since a witch less than a hundred 
years old is not considered independent, 
you live in Andrea's house as her 
apprentice.
07lr.cpt1t076:
And the reason you took Renee's soul 
is...
07lr.cpt1t078:
You want to uphold order for Andrea,
therefore you can't tolerate Renee's 
misbehaviour
07lr.cpt1t080:
Yes...
and there is no need for me to 
explain more.
07lr.cpt1t082:
Hahaha...I didn't expect it would 
be the quietest one...!
07lr.cpt1t083:
It was awful to do such a terrible 
thing behind our backs!
07lr.cpt1t084:
Behind your backs? 
No, I didn't...
07lr.cpt1t085:
It was only because nobody asked me...
I didn't know what to say...
or how to bring it up...
07lr.cpt1t089:
(Don't say it with such 
a frightening face!)
07lr.cpt1t090:
Well, well...looks like Stephanie 
gets a lot scarier when angry! 
Not unlike Drea...
07lr.cpt1t091:
I was not angry...
It was just...Renee got carried away.
She needed to be quiet for a while...
07lr.cpt1t092:
She can't be killed anyway...
It doesn't matter to her, does it?
07lr.cpt1t096:
But...you are truly her apprentice,
destroying anything that you don't 
like!
07lr.cpt1t098:
Stephanie...
Renee wouldn't be much of a problem 
no matter how mischievous she was. 
Don't you know it?
07lr.cpt1t099:
It's good to keep things in order, 
but it's no fun if you stick too 
much to the rules...
07lr.cpt1t100:
I know...
I was going to return her soul 
when Andrea came back...
07lr.cpt1t102: Renee and I had a great time.
07lr.cpt1t105:
You see...
We haven't seen each other for 
a long time...
07lr.cpt1t106:
Won't you get bored of being good
all the time, Vanessa?
07lr.cpt1t107: So that we can have dinner together!
07lr.cpt1t108:
You should keep your words and 
eat this tomato, Lottie!
07lr.cpt1t110:
You should keep your words and 
eat the tomatoes, Lottie!
07lr.cpt1t111:
Fine...
I don't think it's a problem...
07lr.be009:
I don't know who took her soul, or where the soul is now...
Anyway, the world becomes a bit more peaceful, and quieter.
07lr.be010:
But I heard that Renee's puppet show was cute...
There is no chance to see it again.
Is it a pity?
07lr.cpt2t003:
Good to see you!
Can I ask for a favor...?
07lr.cpt2t005: I left an \c[2]hourglass\c[0] in Andrea's room...
07lr.cpt2t006: Can you visit her and bring it for me?
07lr.cpt2t007:
Sure!
(And I can have a look at Andrea's room!)
07lr.cpt2t008:
Thanks! Take this! You'll need it.
I'll be in the attic. See you!
07lr.cpt2t009: \c[1]Tea Dictionary\c[0] was pushed in my hands...
07lr.cpt2t010: \c[1]The Hourglass\c[0] was added to the quests!
07lr.shelf1: There are many books on the shelves.
07lr.shelf2: There is no book about instruments.
07lr.shelf3: A cabinet with some ornaments inside.
07lr.plant: It seems that Andrea likes plants a lot.
07lr.e15t002:
Let me see...
I'll need some \c[2]wood\c[0] and \c[2]strings\c[0]...
07lr.e15t003:
It's better to use \c[2]hardwood\c[0],
which is from trees growing in very
cold areas...
07lr.e15t004:
Strings can be made from this kind of
vines...but they have to be boiled in
potions before they are pliable enough...
07lr.e15t005:
The vines are quite common...
I think Andrea has them in the \c[2]potion
room\c[0]!
07lr.e15t006: But where can I find the wood...
07lr.e29t001:
The purtion room?
Of course, since you're Andrea's guests!
07lr.e29t003:
Please talk to me when you've 
collected the ingredients!
07lr.cathy1:
You were lost in the library?
It's a dangerous place with many 
things from the old time...
07lr.cathy2:
Even Polly and I are forbidden 
to go near...
07lr.cathy3:
I'm glad to see you are safe, 
Miss Charlotte!
07lr.cathy4: Please don't fly in the house...
07lr.sp: Found a \c[1]Spare Part\c[0] of the lamp!

08gf.cat001:
Here it is.
Please be careful!
08gf.cat002:
Thank you, and don't worry, Cathy!
(I'm pretty confident with potions...)
08gf.cat003:
You are already a great witch, 
Miss Charlotte, at such a young age!
08gf.cat004:
Please excuse me...
I should help Polly with the dinner now.
08gf.cat008:
Meow! Yes!
We should put them away...
08gf.cat009:
Though the lamp is fixed,
they'll be useful someday!
08gf.cat010: Sorry it took me too long...
08gf.cat011:
I'm very touched to see Miss Charlotte 
help me like this!
08gf.cat012: The spares of the lamp, I didn't...
08gf.cat013:
It's OK! 
The lamp is already fixed!
08gf.cat014:
I'm very touched to see Miss Charlotte 
trying to help me!
08gf.e19003:
(So this is what the house looks like...
It's pretty normal, I have to say.)
08gf.e21001:
Sorry, 
I shouldn't have ruined your party...
08gf.e21002:
After all, in this world there are 
some difficult witches...
08gf.e21003:
I could have been a better hostess.
Let's have a dinner tomorrow...
08gf.e21006:
Good evening, Andrea!
And Xaviera...you are back, too!
08gf.e21007:
Good evening, Charlotte.
Sorry I have been away...
I hope you are having a good time.
08gf.e21008:
I am! Thanks!
Grandma and Evangeline also
returned earlier...
08gf.e21009:
And Renee is planning to have 
another party with Vanessa!
08gf.e21012: I'm sure it wasn't Vanessa's idea.
08gf.e21013:
Anyway, I'm so happy to see you 
girls getting along...
08gf.e21014:
(Andrea seems tired...
Or am I just overthinking things?)
08gf.e21015:
Have fun!
Though it's not party time for me...
08gf.e21016:
Me, neither. 
I haven't unpacked yet!
08gf.e21018:
Thank you for preparing the attic
for me! Bye!

09kitchen.po1001:
Meow...I don't know what to do!
We have to wait for Ms. Andrea...
09kitchen.po1002:
But of course, I'll prepare the dinner 
as usual!

09kitchen.po6001:

09kitchen.po7001:
Miss Merabell's room?

enjoy cooking!

NOT ENOUGH!

09kitchen.po006: Wooow I almost took the wrong one!

That's it! Now it's time to make 
the caramel sauce...
09kitchen.po011: I can't wait to bring it to Xaviera...!

Only seeing them makes me 
uncomfortable...

14ff.vanedoor15:

15charoom.e34t001: So this is my room, not bad!
15charoom.e34t002:
I think Andrea specially prepared it 
for you...
15charoom.e34t004:
I-I never asked for it!

15charoom.e34t005:
Andrea is such a hospitable lady...\!
This small room reminds me of my 
first time at the party!
15charoom.e34t006:
Andrea insisted on holding 
a tea party, and prepared rooms 
for everyone...

how can I help you?

19sf.cpt2mdt08:
Even Andrea can't do much about

19sf.cpt2mdt15:

are you a cat lover or a dog lover?

Well...
if you will excuse me...

19sf.cpt3mdt18:
There is no way she would open

19sf.cpt3t02:

...everything!
19sf.cpt3t03: Why would she shout at me...
19sf.cpt3t04:
I don't even have a clue...

19sf.cpt3t05:
I don't think Evangeline likes me,

19sf.cpt3t08:

23ne.t3:
So Charlotte saved the world...
Wow, I knew she could do it!
23ne.t4: I knew we would see each other again...

24steph.shelf2001: There is a marked page in the book...
24steph.shelf5001: There is no book about instruments.
24steph.steph1001:
Hi...Are you aware something 
terrible has happened?
24steph.steph1004:
I didn't see you...
Where have you been?
24steph.steph1005:
We have to find out who did it, 
right?
24steph.steph1006: (I don't know what to talk about...)
24steph.steph1007:
(Stephanie's room is facing the 
dining room on the ground floor 
...hmmmm.)
24steph.steph1008:
You have a...a very nice room! 
Perfect for a witch!
24steph.steph1009:
It's so convenient to have a room 
facing the dining room on the ground 
floor...
24steph.steph1011:
(Stephanie only attended the last 
tea party 20 years ago...)
24steph.steph1013:
We have two new guests here...
but it's unfortunate that something 
like this happened.
24steph.steph1014:
The last tea party was 20 years ago...
Ah, it was your first tea party, 
right? Stephanie?
(I don't think I've ever talked to her...)
24steph.steph1017:
Andrea is a great witch. 
Her dream is to protect everybody...
24steph.steph1018: I'll also try my best to help her...
24steph.steph1020:
Renee will be fine...
Don't worry.
24steph.steph1021:
(It's true...but...
It's not a normal situation 
even for witches, is it?!)
24steph.steph3001:
Alright...
I think I've figured it out!
24steph.steph3003: I know who is the culprit now!
24steph.steph3005:
Let's gather everyone in the 
\c[2]living room\c[0]...
And reveal the truth!
24steph.steph3007:
(I know who the culprit is now! 
But it's better to talk to Evangeline, 
too...)
24steph.e6t001:
Wow...
It truly is a witch's room...
24steph.e6t002:
Stephanie looks more like a witch 
than we do...
24steph.e6t003: Vanessa is too gentle and kind!
24steph.e6t004:
(The most particular thing about Vanessa 
is probably how ordinary she can be...)
24steph.stephanie1002:
We are going to have a party 
in Renee's room!
24steph.stephanie1003: Do you want to join us...?
24steph.stephanie1005:
Sorry...!
(After all, Renee was...
and I said she was the culprit!)
24steph.stephanie1009: I can teach you how to hunt Renee...
24steph.stephanie1014: Oh, by the way, this is for you!
24steph.stephanie1016:
That's very nice of you...
and very interesting...
24steph.stephanie4003:
It's true that you are always 
silent...
24steph.stephanie4005:
I've been like this...
for many years...
24steph.stephanie4006:
(Didn't grandma talk about something 
like this?)
24steph.stephanie4007: \c[1]Silent Stephanie\c[0] was added to the quests!
24steph.stephanie6002:
I see...after all, 
it's my fate...
24steph.stephanie6003:
But...
you spoke the truth yesterday, 
didn't you?
24steph.stephanie6004:
It's difficult for you to say 
yourself, but it will be easier 
if I figure it out and speak 
for you, right?
24steph.stephanie6010:
More or less...
but not really...
24steph.stephanie6017:
Emmm...but it's not exactly 
about Cathy and Polly, either...
24steph.stephanie6019:
Well...
I suppose Stephanie's wish is to...
24steph.stephanie6020:
It's much more convenient to 
have your own maid, isn't it?
24steph.stephanie6023:
Hmmm...
it's no big deal anyway.
24steph.stephanie6025:
It's weird, isn't it?
I know I'm a witch...
24steph.stephanie6027:
No no no, it's OK!
It doesn't matter at all!
24steph.stephanie8002:
I'm still a little bothered...
by cats and dogs...
24steph.stephanie8003: Is it true that everyone likes cats?...
24steph.stephanie8004:
Is it that weird for witches to 
have dogs?...
24steph.stephanie8008: Made a questionnaire about \c[1]Cat lovers? Dog lovers?\c[0]!
24steph.stephanie8009: \c[1]Cat lovers? Dog lovers?\c[0] was added to the quests!
24steph.stephanie10002:
I've asked everyone...
though I'm not sure how helpful 
the result is...
24steph.stephanie10003: Showed the report of \c[1]Cat lovers? Dog lovers?\c[0] to Stephanie...
24steph.stephanie10004:
I knew it...
What did I expect...
24steph.stephanie10005: You don't have to be disappointed!
24steph.stephanie10006:
It's what you like!
There's no need to care about what 
the others say...
24steph.stephanie10007:
Thank you...
I appreciate your help...
24steph.stephanie10009: I hope you are enjoying yourself...
24steph.stephanie10010:
I guess so! 
Grandma said I should make some 
friends here...
24steph.stephanie10011:
After all it's more interesting 
than the human parties...!
24steph.stephanie13001:
Evangeline has lost something?...
No, I didn't find anything in 
particular.
24steph.stephanie13002:
Well...
I guess it's not around here...
24steph.stephanie15002:
It's too difficult for me to make 
a conversation...I have to admit...
24steph.stephanie15004:
I have an idea! 
What if there's something that 
can speak for you...?
24steph.stephanie15005:
For example...music!
Can you play any instruments?
24steph.stephanie15007:
Maybe you could try a guitar or 
a lute!
24steph.stephanie15008: And carry it with you...like a bard!
24steph.stephanie15009: \c[1]Another Language\c[0] was added to the quests!
24steph.stephanie15010:
(Though I have no idea how to 
make one...)
24steph.stephanie15011:
(Maybe there are \c[2]books\c[0] about it 
in the house...)
24steph.stephanie17002:
Let me hear if you write a song!
I'm looking forward to it!

25reroom.bed1002:
The room has become a normal one, too.
(If she can't wake up...)
25reroom.bed1003:
Renee was fairly strong...
It must have been a very powerful 
witch.
25reroom.bed1005:
I'm sure it's not Cathy or Polly.
(And Vanessa is very unlikely to 
do it as well...)
25reroom.bed1006:
I'll find out the culprit and let 
Renee wake up again!
25reroom.e9t002:
Harm and chaos cannot be avoided when witches get together...
Is it true?
Is it...natural?
25reroom.e9t003:
When Renee opened her eyes,
we didn't know that in this house...
Destruction was waiting for us.
25reroom.e9t004:
How to achieve happiness with curses?
Her wish was nothing more than a peaceful world...

invite.joinnow001: I should be going there as well!

26sfs.b02: We should put away these bears, too!

26sfs.b08:

What if Renee is there?
26sfs.b09:
Renee is too busy with her tricks,
she won't be hiding inside a cupboard...
26sfs.b17:
What's going on?

26sfs.b23:
This...I think this is the \c[2]paint\c[0] 
that Renee stole from my room...
26sfs.b24:
Oh! The smell...
It is indeed...
26sfs.b25:
Are you kidding me?!
That's impossible!
26sfs.b26:
How could Renee be killed...
And look at the mess...
It's not even blood!
26sfs.b27:
I think It's the \c[2]paint\c[0] that 
Renee stole from my room...
26sfs.b29:
I'm sure she's alive!
Just fainted over the \c[2]paint\c[0]!
26sfs.b35:
This smell...is it \c[2]paint\c[0]?
Renee stole a lot from Vanessa...
26sfs.b37:
This is indeed something 
Renee would do...
26sfs.b38:
Wake up, Mirabell!
This is not blood...
26sfs.b39:
I think It's the \c[2]paint\c[0] that 
Renee stole from my room...
26sfs.b42: I don't think Renee can get up again...
26sfs.m01:
Mirabell?
What are you doing here?
26sfs.m07: "I don't want to see you...Just get out of my sight!"

27a.h: Xaviera's hourglass. It seems very important to her.
27a.b: There is a pile of books in the corner...
27a.q14t02:
It's still empty. I'm thinking 
about getting some decorations...
27a.q14t03:
If you see anything good, 
can you bring it here?
27a.q14t04: \c[1]Home, Sweet Home\c[0] was added to the quests!
27a.q14t05: What kind of decorations do you prefer?
27a.q14t06: For example...which room do you like?
27a.q14t12: The decorations were given to Xaviera!
27a.q14t14:
And...don't forget the hourglass!
I think it's still in Andrea's room...
27a.q14t15: I brought these as a gift...Take some!
27a.q14t21:
Though I think you have a 
different taste...
27a.q14t23:
What's your favourite food, Charlotte?
I can learn something new!
27a.cpt2t04:
By the way...
Can I ask something?
27a.cpt2t06: I saw this in the library...
27a.cpt2t08:
Stephanie and I didn't attend 
those parties because we are young,
27a.cpt2t09:
But why is this the first time 
being Andrea's guest, for you?
27a.cpt2t10:
Haha...I can certainly tell you that 
I'm not a child!
27a.cpt2t11:
And why don't you make the room 
larger?...
27a.cpt2t14:
Not actually.
It seems fun...you know.
27a.cpt2t16:
Interesting...
Why do you think so?
27a.cpt2t19:
Andrea told me that you couldn't
enter her room because it was a 
magical space...
27a.cpt2t20:
In fact, you can't create 
a magical space, either.
27a.cpt2t21:
Yes, it's true...It seems that 
I can't use magic as freely here.
27a.cpt2t23:
You'll definitely be startled 
when you find out!
27a.cpt2t24:
It's very strange that in hundreds 
of years only Andrea knows you...
27a.cpt2t25:
Are you living alone in some 
secret place?...
27a.cpt2t26:
Something like that!
Where I live is far, far away 
from you.
27a.cpt2t27:
Oh wait, I remember there was
another person who met you before!
27a.cpt2t30:
Well...We met once, 
though we hardly "know" each other.
27a.cpt2t32:
Hey, she said I was a lackey to
humans...It's not like that...
27a.cpt2t33:
Though I can understand...
after all, in this world...
27a.cpt2t35:
Witches and humans are enemies...
They are completely antagonistic 
towards each other like light and 
darkness.
27a.cpt2t45:
You...you don't even belong to 
this world!
27a.cpt2t46:
That's why you don't think 
it's strange to have peace 
with humans...
27a.cpt2t48: You are a smart kid, Charlotte.
27a.cpt2t51:
I'm a time mage...There was something 
wrong when I was travelling, and then 
accidentally I ended up here.
27a.cpt2t52:
I met Andrea and had a great time 
with her, therefore I accepted her 
invitation!
27a.cpt2t53:
She was very happy to know there was 
a peaceful world for both witches and 
humans...
even though it was not her own.
27a.cpt2t54:
I can see your problem with 
witches like Evangeline.
27a.cpt2t56:
How did she travel to your 
village then? 
It's in another world!
27a.cpt2t57:
Is it normal to travel between 
different worlds for witches?!
27a.cpt2t59:
It's very rare...
Even Andrea never heard of 
such a thing.
27a.cpt2t60:
I think it was also an accident...
I don't know how she came back, 
and apparently it never happened 
again.
27a.cpt2t61:
Maybe something was wrong with 
her...The magic went out of control 
or something.
27a.cpt2t63:
Her power, or I'd say the power 
when she lost control...was really 
terrible.
27a.cpt2t64:
I thought she was going to burn 
the whole village.
27a.cpt2t65:
You see...it's funny that she 
acts like a grown-up, but can't 
even control her own power.
27a.cpt2t66:
I heard that it's very unlikely 
to happen when a witch is over 
a hundred years old...
27a.cpt2t67: Maybe she is still a baby inside!
27a.cpt2t69:
I haven't told everyone about 
myself because I thought it could 
be a surprise!
27a.cpt2t70: But you figured it out first...
27a.cpt2t72:
Thank you for helping me, 
and I had a great time talking 
to you!
27a.xt02:
Age...
I don't really care about it.
27a.xt05:
Cooking, of course! 
Delicious food and a lovely kitchen 
are the best!
27a.xt08: So are they spicy or sweet?!
27a.xt09:
There're thousands of possibilities 
in cooking! You should have an open 
mind about it, Charlotte!
27a.xt10:
(I think the point is more about 
the taste than the mind...!)
27a.xt11: To have a peaceful life...I guess.
27a.xt12:
(I didn't expect that 
from a witch...)
27a.xt13:
I hope your world is a peaceful 
one, too! Peace is the best!
27a.xt15:
Oh, I love cats...
I even have a few at home!
27a.xt16: It's true, even in another world...
27a.xt17:
But there could also be dog loving
witches, I think! 
The world is huge and anything is 
possible!
27a.xt18:
It's no big deal if some of us 
like dogs, is it?
27a.xt21: The Report of \c[1]Cats lover? Dog lover?\c[0] is finished!
27a.xt22:
(Maybe I can show it to Stephanie 
later...though I'm not sure if it 
will be useful...)
27a.xt24:
(There is no way she knows how to 
enter her room...)
27a.q23t02:
Hi...
Oh! We agreed to cook together!
You haven't forgotten, have you?
27a.q23t04:
I'll show you the most delicious 
thing in the world!
27a.q23t05:
Wow, I guess it will be completely 
new to me...
I'm looking forward to it!
27a.q23t06: \c[1]The Most Delicious\c[0] was added to the quests!
27a.q23t07: Wrote down the Recipe \c[1]Caramel Potato Mash\c[0]!
27a.q23t13:
Is it good? Is it the BEST?
Have you ever had anything so 
sweet?!
27a.q23t14: It IS completely new to me...
27a.q23t19:
I-I guess I still have a lot 
to learn about your world!
27a.q23t20: But I'm sure this is better!
27a.q23t22: Got the Recipe \c[1]Passion from the Sea\c[0]!
27a.q23t23:
Well...Fish is not bad...
(But seafood cookies are going
too far!)
27a.q23t24:
Thanks anyway!
Let's cook together some other time!
27a.cpt4t01:
Oh really? Evangeline is shouting at 
everyone because she lost something?
27a.cpt4t03:
No, it's not! It's not the time for 
making fun of her...
Do you have any clue?
27a.cpt4t04:
Well, I do. 
I happened to find something 
a moment ago...
27a.cpt4t13: Her headdress? I didn't see any...
27a.cpt4t14:
(I don't think she even wears 
a headdress...)
27a.cpt4t15:
You are looking for it without 
even knowing what it is? 
You are a funny kid...but sweet 
as well.
27a.cpt4t17:
(Though I do believe something she 
usually wears is missing...)
27a.cpt4t18:
Yes, that's it!
I found it on the stairs just now...
27a.cpt4t19:
The sapphire is very beautiful...
It suits her well.
27a.cpt4t22:
She lost her own necklace and then 
shouted at the others...
It's not easy to be a hostess here.
27a.cpt4t23:
Indeed...
I'd better give it back to her now!
27a.cpt4t24:
Great! 
It's better if you return it!
27a.cpt4t25:
You know...I haven't spoken with 
most of you...In fact, I was going 
to try \c[2]that\c[0] on the necklace...
27a.cpt4t27:
A spell. 
So that I can learn about it and 
its owner...Interesting, right?
27a.cpt4t29:
Charlotte
do you understand why I am here?
27a.cpt4t30:
It's all guided by fate...
Do you believe it?
27a.cpt4t31:
Your world...or more precisely, 
Andrea's world needs me. 
I think that's why I'm able to 
travel here.
27a.cpt4t33:
So...just ask me if you need 
anything. I'll try my best to 
be helpful.
27a.cpt4t37:
Just ask me if you need anything.
I'll try by best to be helpful.
27a.cpt4t38:
You're back...Is there anything 
I can help you with?
27a.cpt4t39:
I didn't find Evangeline...
and her room...was strange.
27a.cpt4t40:
Is it possible to find out more 
about her...?
27a.cpt4t41:
Do you still have the necklace? 
We can have a try...
27a.cpt4t42:
I want to know why it's so precious 
to Evangeline...
27a.cpt4t43:
And why she became so angry 
without it...
27a.cpt4t45:
It's a terrible age...
Even Daria sent you here...\!
I don't want to get into any trouble.
27a.cpt4t46:
She died...?
I knew their ideas would kill them one day.\|
Augustine was useless...
27a.cpt4t47:
Learn magic...?
You are a dangerous kid...aren't you.\|
I can't let you out.
27a.cpt4t48: Stay here, until you can control yourself.
27a.cpt4t49:
You can use the library though...
Don't go out looking for death. \|
Your mother didn't send you here for that.
27a.cpt4t50:
Stop staring at me...\|
Fine...I have a gift for you.
27a.cpt4t56:
Someone gave her this necklace...
and locked her up...
27a.cpt4t58:
No wonder she's always in an awful 
mood...carrying such memories...
27a.cpt4t59:
Somehow I think Evangeline can't 
attack...at least, couldn't.
27a.cpt4t60:
Now that I think about it, she was 
not that serious yesterday...right?
27a.cpt4t61:
I don't believe it...
Have you forgotten about 
the first time we met?
27a.cpt4t62:
She couldn't attack? 
You didn't see my burning house...
27a.cpt4t63: What on earth is going on...?
27a.cpt4t64: \c[1]Almost Burnt the Village\c[0] was added to the notes!
27a.cpt4t65:
I don't think I can help with 
Evangeline's past...
27a.cpt4t66: Maybe you can ask Andrea or Marilyn?
27a.cpt4t68:
(Daria, Augustine, and that man...
Who are they?)
27a.cpt4t69:
I want to know what's inside 
the sapphire!
27a.cpt4t70:
What does it mean by 
"you are in there, too"?
27a.cpt4t71:
But I can't open it...
Neither do we have 
\c[2]more clues about Evangeline\c[0]...
27a.cpt4t73:
(Though I don't think she will 
lend us anything even if she's 
here...)
27a.cpt4t78: I don't know what to do now...
27a.cpt4t86:
It seems to be nothing more than 
a piece of ice.
27a.cpt4t87: The quality of the wood is good...
27a.cpt4t88:
But it doesn't mean anything special 
to Evangeline.
27a.cpt4t91:
I think it's a house that Evangeline 
used to live in!
Maybe with her family!
27a.cpt4t92:
I see...with all that information, 
you can probably visit her memory...
27a.cpt4t95: It's nothing special. What a pity.
27a.cpt4t96:
It seems that she built the palace 
only for display...
like a living room decoration.
27a.f2:
She was cursed by her mother...
That's why...
27a.f4: If a witch dies, won't her magic...
27a.te01:
I didn't expect you to come back 
so soon.
27a.te05:
No...not Evangeline's memory, 
I mean the real village!
27a.te06:
I'll sneak out of the house...
Don't let the others know!
27a.te07:
Now? To a human village that 
you've never been to?
27a.te09:
...No problem.\|
Just stay safe and come back soon.

\{HAHAHAHAHAHA!!

37mari.sit1001:
How is it going, Lottie?
Are you missing me?
37mari.sit1002:
Oh, you're going to have a party?
That's great!
37mari.sit1004: Unless you can't go without me!
37mari.friend001:
The friendship...
I guess it's like this.
37mari.sit3002:
Mirabell won't let you in?
She has always been like that...
37mari.sit3003:
It's not because she doesn't like you.
Don't worry!
37mari.sit3004: But it's kind of bothering me...
37mari.sit3005: Then you should pay her a visit!
37mari.sit3006:
O-OK...
(It's easy for you to say...)
37mari.sit3009: Don't you feel lonely by yourself...?
37mari.mari1001:
How are you, Lottie?
Are you having a good time?
37mari.mari1002: The weather is so nice today.
37mari.mari1003:
She remains silent even when she 
wants to speak...
37mari.mari1004:
"The life of a witch is a cursed 
one"...\!Being a witch...
is it a blessing or a curse?
37mari.mari1005:
There is not much you can do about 
it when you're already a witch...
regardless of if it's good or bad.
37mari.mari1006:
Maybe it's more important to think about 
how to deal with your life.
37mari.mari1008:
"The life of a witch is a cursed one"...\!
I told you before, remember?
37mari.mari1010:
Does it mean she can never express 
herself freely as she wishes...?

37mari.mari1011:

every witch has her own problem...
37mari.mari1012:
I...\|
Is your life cursed, too?
37mari.mari1014:

37mari.mari1015: So...it's better to let Stephanie know.
37mari.maricat: You know I love cats, don't you?
37mari.mari1025:

things you don't want in her library.
she has a lot of old stuff already...

37mari.cpt41003: Oh! You've started to think about it?
37mari.cpt41007:
...If it was her choice, 
you have to respect it.
37mari.cpt41008:
No matter if it was to kill, 
to trade her soul or to leave...
The decisions were hers, so she 
alone was responsible for them.
37mari.cpt41009: It's alright as long as you are back.
37mari.cpt41010:
A curse is heavy...
and you did it to save her...
37mari.cpt41012:
And considering your power,

or two. Don't worry!
37mari.cpt41013:
(Should I be happy or offended

37mari.cpt41014:
I hope history won't be

37mari.cpt41016:

37mari.cpt41018: It's nice of you to help!

37mari.cpt41021:

37mari.cpt41023:

37mari.cpt42002:
Evan's past...
she never talked about it.
37mari.cpt42003:

maybe Drea knows something.

37mari.cpt42005:

37mari.cpt42006:

41vane2.vane2002:
Oh, by the way, 
I have to ask you something!
41vane2.vane2003:
Which do you prefer? 
Cats or dogs?
41vane2.vane2004:
It's a difficult question...
I guess the answer is cats. 
Though dogs are cute as well!
41vane2.vane4003: You won every game with Renee?!
41vane2.vane4004: You are a real player...aren't you?!
41vane2.vane4007:
What if we can't see each other 
tomorrow?!
41vane2.vane4008:
I see...It's no big deal to lose 
a few games...!
41vane2.vane4011:
It's a tie!
Let's try again...
41vane2.vane6002:
I hope we can play games again 
some day...!!
41vane2.vane7001: Please don't fly in the room...
41vane2.e7t003:
How are you feeling, Vanessa?!
Are you ill?...
41vane2.e7t004:
I brought you breakfast!
Sorry...I should have given you 
a break yesterday...
41vane2.e7t005:
It was no big deal yesterday... 
The problem is...today...
41vane2.e7t006:
Thank you...I was hesitating to go 
to the dining room downstairs...
41vane2.e7t011:
You...
You should stay in your room today!!
41vane2.e7t012:
I won't go out, 
not even a single step!
41vane2.e7t015:
It's probably my only ability, 
to \c[2]foresee danger\c[0]...!
That's how I've survived until 
today...
41vane2.e7t016:
Trust me!! Today...
Something terrible will happen!
Maybe you could die! 
We are in danger! All of us!
41vane2.e7t017:
I don't care if you call me a 
coward...
I won't leave my room today!
41vane2.e7t019:
Have your breakfast then!
And see you tomorrow!
41vane2.e7t020:
Sure! Promise me, Charlotte!
Stay alive!
41vane2.e7t021:
Of course!
(She is acting funny today...)
41vane2.e7t022:
(What could possibly happen on 
such a nice day?)
41vane2.e24t004:
I have never won a game, 
you know...!!
41vane2.e24t005:
Charlotte beat Renee...
then I beat Charlotte...
41vane2.e24t006: Does it make me the world champion?!
41vane2.e24t007:
NO NO NO...
It's the omen! 
The omen of the end of the world!!
41vane2.e24t009:
Charlotte...
You LET me win, didn't you?
You know it's impossible for 
me to...
41vane2.e24t010:
No, I didn't!
Why do you think so?
It's natural to win or to lose, 
right?!
41vane2.e24t011:
Haha...thanks.
I had a great time.
41vane2.e24t012:
There were some beautiful memories, 
even if the world is going to its end!
41vane2.cleaned: It has been cleaned up here.

42s.a2:
Charlotte is here! 
Renee is happy!
42s.m04:
I like those pretty white dresses...
and dolls...
42s.m08:
(Wait a second...you are a witch!
Why church?!)
42s.m09:
(...The dress she wears...
Is it a wedding dress?)
42s.v02: Renee's bear is soft and warm...
42s.v03:
Charlotte! 
How can you just ask a lady such 
a question!
42s.v04:
Though I uesed to care about it, 
too...
42s.v05:
Everyone can get curious...
I guess.
42s.v07:
Anyway, I'm A LOT older than you...
Anyway there is nothing special 
about me except my long life...
42s.v08:
(She speaks with a light tone...
but the atmosphere is getting heavy...)
42s.v09:
(How many years does she mean 
by 'A LOT'?...)
42s.v11:
And staying inside my room! 
It's the most relaxing!
42s.v12:
I wish, one day, 
that I could be popular...
42s.v13:
But I don't care much about it now, 
after being obscure for centuries...
42s.v15:
I won't! It doesn't matter if I 
stay obscure for a few more centuries!
42s.r03:
Renee was sealed away too many 
times, and can't remember what 
happened in the past!
42s.r04:
But Renee won't die! 
Renee will live as long as 
she doesn't die!
42s.r05:
And Renee will always be 
Charlotte's friend!
42s.r06:
Don't die, Charlotte!
And don't forget about Renee!
42s.r08:
Renee likes fighting! 
Blood splashes! 
Happy!
42s.r09: But Andrea says killing is not allowed...
42s.r10:
It's not bad to have a bucket of 
ketchup in the house, right?!
42s.r12:
Renee's wish is to be 
the Great Devil!
42s.r13:
No, no, no, there's no Great Devil 
in this world anymore!
42s.r14:
(Or...she would surely get 'killed'
again if she became one...)
42s.r15:
Do you want to hear a story?
You will have to go to bed after that 
because it's a bedtime story!
42s.r16: It's a story about this world!
42s.r17:
Once upon a time, 
there lived gods in a place far, 
far away...
42s.r18:
Cheerful and carefree, 
the gods created the world...\!
The humans were their beloved children, 
as brilliant and innocent as sunshine.
42s.r19:
However, these bright happy days were boring!\!
Therefore, monsters were born as well, 
as mysterious and fearful as the darkest nights.
42s.r20:
Humans and monsters fought each other ever since.
The battles would never stop, and they would never get bored...\!
What a funny world!
42s.r21:
What are we?...\!Monsters, of course!
Hahahahahahaha...!!
42s.r25:
Renee doesn't remember any more 
of the story!
42s.r26:
Well...it's true.
We are monsters, of course.
42s.r28: (The story seemed to be cut off...)
42s.r30:
We are monsters...
Is there any place for monsters in this world anymore?
42s.r31:
I didn't know, which bothered me a little...
However, staying with them...the other witches,
42s.r32:
I had friends for the first time.
I could talk freely without being worried, or judged...
42s.r33:
Loneliness...\!
Maybe it's not a curse that I cannot get rid of.
42s.r35: Renee has to think about it...
42s.s05:
...I do.
But I don't know how to 
talk about them.
42s.s06:
Make a wish in your heart, then!
The stars will know!
42s.s07:
The stars... and Charlotte, 
are gentle.

43l.d2: Maybe I should find another way out...
43l.a:
It seems that...
something is not quite right...
43l.a1:
How did I end up in a place 
like this..?
43l.l:
There is something inside the bottle...
strange yet beautiful, shining quietly.
43l.c: A small counter full of books, yet without a librarian.
43l.fm: Found some \c[1]Matches\c[0] on the empty shelf.
43l.fb: A book seems to be placed wrong...
43l.b1:
The gods created this world...and all the lives and rules.
Blessings and curses are like light and shadows.
43l.b2:
The humans were their beloved children, 
as brilliant and innocent as sunshine, 
blessed by the gods.\|
While monsters... belonged to the darkest nights.
43l.b3:
It's similar to Renee's story...
Is it a witch's tale?
43l.b4: Bearing the pain of curses, monsters gained power.
43l.b5:
However, a cursed life is nothing more than eternal darkness 
no matter how long it lasts.
Their wicked power is unable to protect anything no matter 
how strong it is.
43l.s1: Hi, it has been a long time, Marilyn!
43l.s2:
Sorry, I'm not Marilyn...
My name is Charlotte, Marilyn's 
grand-daughter.
43l.s3:
Oh, Marilyn has a grand-daughter!\!
Forgive me, Miss! The hat is addling my mind...
43l.s4: Though I'm not sure if I still have any mind...
43l.s5: Can you help me find my hat?
43l.s6:
There has been something running around in the library 
recently...like in the old days.
43l.s7: It gives me such a headache!
43l.s8:
Though my head doesn't literally ache, you know.
Being a skeleton means a much simpler life.
43l.s9:
(He talks A LOT...
Maybe he has been here for too long.)
43l.s12: \c[1]The Hats\c[0] was added to the quests!
43l.s15: ...Hello? Why are you so quiet all of a sudden?
43l.s16: Yes! This is my hat! Thank you sooooo much!
43l.s17: That's veeeery nice of you, Miss!
43l.s18: Gave the \c[1]Top Hat\c[0] back to Mr. Skeleton!
43l.s19:
I don't need this one anymore...You can have it!
It's a witch hat...I would have troubles wearing it!
43l.s23: It's weird! Anyway, the whole library is weird...
43l.s24:
There's a small room that's extremely disturbing...
I don't even dare to go near.
43l.s27: Brooms are too sensitive...not down to earth at all!
43l.s28:
(They wouldn't be able to fly if they 
were down to earth...)
43l.s29:
You made them quiet? Good job! 
That's the power of a witch!
43l.s30:
Andrea's library...is more like a warehouse now.
Old things are piling up here...
43l.s31:
Those things that are useless or dangerous...
or the things she doesn't know how to deal with.
There are things missing, that were placed on 
the top of the shelves...
43l.s32:
I can't climb the ladders...
Ah, it's not because I'm afraid of heights!
43l.s33: ...I would probably fall apart if I walk around too much.
43l.s35: If I can ever go out again...I wish to study archaeology.
43l.s36: I think I can get along with relics...

44b.t6:
(Oh...I'm sure they'll listen to me 
if I put on that...!)
44b.t8: Hey! I'm not afraid of you!
44b.t12:
DEAD END II
    Nobody Ever Saw Charlotte Again

45maze.e2001: I've walked for quite some time...

46an.table002: OK...I'll just leave the book here.
46an.table006:
It looked like Renee's...
Why would it be here?
She'd better not...
46an.tree1: A big tree growing inside the room.
46an.an1002: I'm a bit older than Marilyn...
46an.an1003:
Just celebrated my 200th birthday 
some years ago...
46an.an1004:
Marilyn is a grandmother now...
It doesn't make me feel very young...
46an.an1007:
Ah, and gardening as well.
I enjoy the time with plants

46an.an1010:
(It sounds like an ending of a 
fairy tale...)
46an.an1013:
Oh, by the way, 
what do you prefer? Cats or dogs?
46an.an1014: Are you OK? You look tired...
46an.an1016:

a difficult task...)
46an.an1017:
I think it is the time to clean up 
the library...
46an.an1018:
The things I don't know how to deal 
with, or can't throw away...
It's distracting if the unnecessary 
things keep piling up there.
46an.an1019:
Charlotte...
Could you help me with it?
46an.an1021: \c[1]Unnecessary Feelings\c[0] was added to the quests!
46an.an1022:
I apologize on behalf of my grandma!
I don't think it was very nice to 
leave the things she didn't want 
there...
46an.an1023:
She knew you already had too much
to deal with...
46an.an1026:
In that room...There is something 
I can't throw away.
46an.an1027:
And something Marilyn asked me 
to keep.
46an.an1028:
Do you mean the bottle?
What's inside?
46an.an1029:
............\!
The pieces of a broken heart.
46an.an1030:
It was from the first curse that 
Marilyn put on a human.
46an.an2001:
Mirabell?
Hmmm...I've never been in her room.
46an.an2003: (I'm going to have a great discovery!)
46an.an5001:
Evangeline's temper is worse than 
usual...
46an.an6001:
Evangeline's necklace! I found it!
But she is not in her room...
46an.an6002:
I didn't see her, either.
Maybe it's too hard for her to 
just wait there.
46an.an6004:
You know witches can be very 
difficult...
46an.an6005: But is it the only reason?
46an.an6006:
She is always like that...
What can I do about it?
46an.an6007:
(Evangeline's hostility towards 
Andrea must be related to this...)
46an.an6011:
I think Andrea is also the reason 
that Evangeline hates this tea party...
46an.an6012:
You two were fighting each other from 
the beginning...
and you said...you would kill her...
46an.an6014:
Now we don't belong to this world 
anymore...I don't want another war 
to bring disaster upon us.
46an.an6015:
It's true that I will kill her if 
she dares to hurt anyone.
46an.an6016: But you are friends, aren't you?!
46an.an6017:
...If she chooses to be the enemy, 
How can I tolerate her anymore?
46an.an6018:
Friends...Do you remember how the war 
started at first?
46an.an6021:
If I insist on saying that 
I'm protecting everyone... 
Would you agree with me?
46an.an6023:
I, I'll ask Evangeline!
I'll try to figure out what she is 
angry about!...and what she expects 
from the world...
46an.an6024:
There will be a solution if we can 
talk about it...! 
A tea party should be the best way 
to do it, shouldn't it?!
46an.an6025:
A witch of the new age is different...
I knew it.
46an.an6027:
However...
I don't think Evangeline will share 
her thoughts with you even if you ask.
46an.an6029: No problem! Leave it to me!
46an.an6032:
I believe you can do something 
that we were unable to achieve.
46an.an7002: I'm not the hostess that you expected.
46an.an8001:
What's wrong?! 
You don't look very well...
46an.an8002:
How much do you know about the 
past...?
46an.an8004:
Alex. I heard of him...\|Evangeline probably wouldn't be 
alive if not for him...
46an.an8005:
However...Even Evangeline didn't 
see him again after that...
There is not even a tombstone.
46an.an8006:
Nothing can be left when a monster 
disappears...
46an.an8007:
I had a hard time looking for the 
survivors, you know...
46an.an10001:
Evangeline's family...?
Sorry, I have no ideas.
46an.e21t001:
Ah! I'm finally back to normal!\!
Everyone thought I was grandma...
46an.e21t002: Sorry, my library made a mistake...
46an.e21t003: It has become a complete mess...
46an.e21t004:
But when I try to clean it...
I don't even know where to start.
46an.e21t005:
You are too young to have troubles

46an.e21t010:

I should give the hourglass back 
to Xaviera!
46an.e21t011:
It's curious...
Why didn't she come here herself?
The password is not complicated...
46an.e21t012:
Maybe the difficult part is

46an.e21t013:
It was my fault asking her to collect 
it herself. Fortunately it wasn't her 
that got lost inside...
46an.e21t014:
Why the room is difficult 
for her...?
46an.e21t015:
You have too many questions!
Maybe you can ask her.

46an.standing005:

46an.standing006:

46an.standing010:
Death is important to witches

46an.standing011:
You'll live better when you know
how to deal with death.
46an.standing012:
Evangeline? 
It's rare to see you here...
46an.standing016:
I'll burn it all to ashes if 
I can't find it!
46an.standing017:
...Stop it.
Don't try to challenge my patience, 
Evangeline.
46an.standing018:
I'll ask Cathy and Polly to 
help you...
46an.standing019:
You've been acting funny...
What are you planning?
46an.standing020:
I know you...
I won't forgive you if you dare to...
46an.standing024:
Your necklace, right?
I noticed it as soon as you entered
the room...
46an.standing027:
(Even Andrea, who is nice to 
everyone...
She may get angry this time...)

Thank you, Charlotte!
I really appreciate your help!

I'll finish the work later...
after a tea break!
46an.e32t008: Oh, by the way...I found this...
46an.e32t009:
Kitty!\! I've been looking for him!
There he was...
46an.e32t011: You have a pet as well?!
46an.e32t012:
He was a stray cat wandering 
around the house...
and I kept him.
46an.e32t013:
Thank you for bringing him 
out of the library!

47l.b3:
There's definitely all kinds of 
books here...
47l.f3: It's a huge crack...and I can't see the bottom.
47l.f4:
DEAD END III
    Look Before You Leap
47l.t1: Monsters are meant to be killed by humans...aren't they?
47l.t2:
"You should appreciate it...
when the brave heroes end your empty lives!"
Shouted the children of the gods.
47l.t3:
Empty? 
Is it true that destruction and chaos have no meaning?
Or is it just a meaning that's not accepted by humans?
47l.t4:
Heroes and monsters have been fighting...
The human world has grown prosperous,
while the monsters grow weaker and weaker through battles 
with humans...or or each other.
47l.t7:
Is eating humans allowed?
We eat them, don't we?
47l.t8:
Is it allowed to protect humans?
We live in the same world...don't we?
47l.t9:
The disagreement became more and more furious...
and finally, led to a war.
47l.t10:
During the war between monsters...
Many of them were killed by human heroes as well,
regardless of what the monsters believed.
47l.t11:
Were they destroyed by humans or by themselves?
It doesn't matter anymore.
Humans won, and have become the masters of the world.
47l.t12:
Maybe the cursed lives were destined for doom...
There is no hope in curses. Never.

51hr.p:
A portrait. 
The tile is "The Girl Who Loves Tomato".
51hr.l:
Some broken pieces...shining gently in the bottle.
...But somehow it feels sad.
51hr.b5:
The life of a witch is too long. 
Endless, and meaningless.
51hr.b6:
Despair emerges from boredom. 
Witches would disappear when they could no longer feel 
any excitement or changes with the passing days.
51hr.b7:
Therefore...they challenged humans. 
They tried to break the silence in their lives with curses, 
even if their evil deeds might bring them death.
51hr.b8: It was better than drowning in peace, they believed.
51hr.b9:
"Don't be so stiff...and stubborn, Drea. 
You'll be bored to death."
51hr.b10:
Every day in Marilyn's life was fresh and cheerful.\!
She was full of surprises...It was natural for her to try
anything, including to live among humans.
51hr.b11:
After the war...I told her that I would like to set 
a new order among the survivors.\!
An order to make sure each one of us could live on in this 
human world...
51hr.b12: She said it sounded like an interesting idea, smiling.
51hr.b13:
I knew it wouldn't be easy...
But I wanted to protect them in this new world.
51hr.b15:
Because when I talked about it, 
Marilyn had the smile on her face, 
just like it was in my memory.
51hr.b16: It was the most precious thing to me in the whole world.

52re.1001:
Marilyn...is that you?
Why did you come to me?...
52re.1002: Or...did you come to a conclusion?
52re.1005:
I've never seen you before...
Who are you? Why you are here...?
52re.1008:
I've been sleeping...
and can't remember...
52re.1009:
What's the time?...
Is it day, or night?
52re.1011:
I see...
But the night will fall upon us, 
won't it?
52re.1014:
You want to leave here?
Do me a favor then...
52re.1015:
I've been waiting...
for a very, very long time......
52re.2002:
Obviously, 
because you are becoming weak.
52re.2003:
It's impossible!
Was it you that released her?!
I said NO!
52re.2004:
Why...
Even YOU wouldn't listen to me!
52re.2005:
Hahahahaha! Andrea...
What did you expect?
52re.2006:
Even if you hide the past away...
Even if you hide me...
Does it make me, or the past disappear?
52re.2007:
You are a traitor...
You betrayed us and had almost everyone 
killed...Your family is gone. 
The monster's world is gone...
52re.2008:
It is only a few cowards that 
remain...sneaking among humans, 
and slowly losing their power 
in this dull world!
52re.2009:
What were you expecting?
What are you trying to do?
Hahahahaha...!
52re.2011:
It was not my fault...
It was not my fault...
52re.2012:
I didn't blame you, Andrea...
It's all because of this terrible 
world, isn't it?
52re.2013:
If the world is reallly so nice...
why do I exist?
52re.2014:
Release me...I'll erase all of 
it, and let the monsters have 
a fresh start...
52re.2015:
You can still be the witch leader, 
like you wish! 
Doesn't that sound good?? 
Hahahahaha...
52re.2016:
Everything will be back for you...
to protect, to lead...
to rebuild your honorable family...
52re.2017:
Or I'll have to stay here and keep 
telling you this...\!
Until you can finally see the answer.
52re.2018:
I'm good at waiting...Andrea.
You will understand one day...
what the choice of a real witch is.
52re.2019:
Hopefully, before your power and 
life disappear into mediocrity...
52re.be002:
It's a lovely child...
Can I eat her?
52re.be005:
Do you know how to end a witch's life?
Besides literally "killing" her.
52re.be006:
Dullness, boredom, mediocrity...
driving away their desires and dreams...\!
She will die, when she is...simply alive.
52re.be007:
Andrea called it "peace",
and hoped everyone could "live happily ever after".
She thought she was protecting the ladies...\|
Why was she always so arrogant?
52re.be008:
She was torn...she was hesitant...
That was why I could gain freedom again...
52re.be009:
She was set free as well...
Hahahahaha......
52re.be010:
Don't get me wrong...
I'm not the one who killed her.
52re.4003:
Andrea is not dying...!
We...we are going to have dinner 
together later in the evening!
52re.4005:
I know what I am doing.
Don't you worry about it.
52re.4008:
(Andrea looks frightening when 
she is serious...)
52re.4011: Have you figured out who she is?
52re.4013:
Yes, Renee. The evil witch that 
cannot be destroyed. 
She is dangerous...I won't let her 
escape.
52re.4014:
Though this is the best I can do...
You know, She will never die.
52re.4015:
(Andrea has been keeping Renee 
here all by herself...)
52re.4016:
Maybe she was awakened by our 
gathering...
52re.4018:
Sorry...I shouldn't have walked 
around in your room...
52re.4019: You remind me of Marilyn, a lot.
52re.4020:
Well, this is not a good place 
for talking.
Let's get out of here.

64lr.t04:
