65rr.d: I need to find that guy...!
65rr.d1:
I should check the garden 
one more time...
65rr.a03:
You must be Mira's guests...
Welcome!
65rr.a04:
Please wait a little longer...
and then my sweet Mira will be 
my bride!
65rr.a05:
You are here for the moment, 
aren't you?
65rr.a06:
So...there is really a wedding 
ceremony...
65rr.a07:
Of course! You don't even know 
why you are here?
65rr.a08:
I mean...you are also a monster, 
like us, aren't you?
65rr.a09:
Oh...how dare you say such a thing 
to me?!\|...However, I'll forgive you 
today because this is my wedding.
65rr.a10: You are a real noble...of humans?
65rr.a11:
...I can't pretend not to hear your 
insults if you don't stop your stupid 
jokes, young lady.
65rr.a12:
Something is not right! 
Not a single person is here, 
except you!
65rr.a14:
We fell from the sky...
There were dolls dancing on the 
clouds, telling me that...
65rr.a15:
I fell from the sky...
There were dolls dancing on the 
clouds, telling me that...
65rr.a17:
Maybe you can tell me...
some other time?
65rr.a19:
You girls are dolls...sweet, 
but silly, aren't you?
65rr.a21:
Haha...No time for joking.
Please excuse me...
65rr.a22: Mira and I...are a perfect couple.
65rr.a24:
Love will easily confuse you...
I can't save you if you throw your 
life away for it.
65rr.a26:
That's Mirabell's fiancee...
A little annoying...I have to say...
65rr.a27:
Anyway! I know I shouldn't judge 
the others' relationship!
65rr.a28: As long as he loves Mirabell...
65rr.a29: \c[1]Ernest the Marquess\c[0] was added to the notes!
65rr.a31:
Mirabell won't let us in because she 
has been preparing for the wedding!
65rr.a32: You know all of these are illusions...
65rr.a33:
...Yes. 
And she NEVER let anyone in...
65rr.a34:
...Maybe not. 
She NEVER let anyone in...
65rr.a35:
Then what's happening?! 
Who is he?
65rr.a36:
Her prince charming in the dream? 
Her first love? The ex-boyfriend 
that she was forced to break up with 
because he was a human?!
65rr.a37:
It's not something that you 
have to hide, Mirabell!
65rr.s02:
Mirabell was murdered! 
You saw it, too...!
65rr.s04: No! I don't know anything about it!
65rr.s05: Though I really want to say this...
65rr.s09:
Sure...of course! 
It's my wedding! My bride!
I'm the victim!
65rr.s10:
Dammit...
Women are nothing but trouble!
65rr.s12: You don't care about Mirabell at all...
65rr.s13:
However, you wouldn't have murdered 
her, because you don't have the...
65rr.s14:
Because...You don't have a reason 
to kill her.
65rr.s15:
Though I don't think he could hurt 
Mirabell either, it's not the point...
He was not the culprit because he 
didn't have the...
65rr.s16:
Even if he didn't love Mirabell, 
he wouldn't kill her...because he 
didn't have the...
65rr.s17:
Marriage only brings you benefit...
Am I correct?
65rr.s18:
Humph...sure! 
That's why I was marrying her!
65rr.s19: Why would I kill my own bride?!
65rr.s20: How could I destroy my own wedding?!
65rr.s21:
You have no idea how much 
I need this wedding!
65rr.s23:
(The reason why he needed 
the wedding is...)
65rr.s24: What are you trying to say?
65rr.s26:
'If she dies...Marquess is definitely 
the culprit...'
65rr.s27:
I thought it was about Mirabell...
but it was actually related to this!
65rr.s28:
You...not only broke the ladies' 
hearts, but also let them disappear...
from society, and maybe from this 
world as well.
65rr.s29:
However, the gossip and scandals 
wouldn't be erased easily...
65rr.s30: So you need a wife, a perfect family...
65rr.s33:
I needed a wife...
Her father needed money...
65rr.s34:
And she...she needed someone to 
realise her stupid dream of love!
65rr.s36: but you chose her. How ridiculous!
65rr.s37:
Did you know who she was...
Would you want to be with her 
if you knew?!
65rr.s39:
Mirabell was the most innocent...no, 
the stupidest girl I had ever seen!
65rr.s40:
I was the one who saved her family, 
willing to take their silly daughter 
at such a price!
65rr.s41:
How could you say something so mean?!
She really cared about you...
65rr.s42:
Humph...She had an empty head, 
just the same as her father...
65rr.s43:
Old Count Toulouse lost all his fortune 
in gambling, and had to trade his 
daughter to keep supporting the family!
65rr.s44:
And a wedding was just the thing 
I wanted...
65rr.s45:
We were meant to be together...
You have to admit!
65rr.s48:
Maybe Mirabell died because she 
couldn't get a happy life with him.
65rr.s49:
I can tell she was looking forward 
to the wedding...
65rr.s50:
The man was right. She was stupid, 
believing she would be happy as long 
as she was getting married...
65rr.s51:
Please don't say that! Can't you 
understand it was a girl's dream?!
65rr.s52:
But...Hold on a second!
If Mirabell is dead, all these rooms 
would no longer exist! They are 
created by her magic after all...
65rr.s53:
Sure. 
I guess she is just watching us...
65rr.s55: I should have thought of it earlier!
65rr.s56:
(Maybe I should check the garden 
one more time...)
65rr.s57: The note \c[1]Ernest the Marquess\c[0] was updated!

66e.s:
What happened?!
The wind was terrible...
66e.s3:
What is this place...
It became so creepy all of a sudden.
66e.s4:
Anyway, there's no use just 
waiting here...
66e.t3:
Where are we...
What is Mirabell doing?!
66e.t4: It became so creepy all of a sudden...
66e.t5:
Anyway, there's no use just 
waiting here. Let's go.
66e.e1:
Are you alright, Evangeline?!
You saved me...
66e.e2:
It was only because you were 
awful at flying!
You knocked me down!
66e.e3:
Don't fly if you can't! 
Or there has to be someone 
on the ground to catch you!
66e.e5:
Thank you...!
The wind was terrible...
66e.e6:
I said I wasn't going to catch you!
It was you that fell on me!

67s.t2:
It's too empty...
There aren't even any clouds...
67s.t3: How long is this gonna take...?

69b.g1:
If she dies...
Marquess is definitely the culprit...
69b.g2:
Yes, of course! 
I'm sure he is the culprit...
69b.g3:
You know...actually, Marquess was engaged to
a viscountess...
69b.g4:
However, a week before their wedding, 
the viscountess went missing...
Nobody saw her ever again!
69b.g5:
It's a secret! Marquess says nobody should know!
Of course we can't let Mirabell hear the scandal!
69b.g6: \c[1]Scandal\c[0] about the viscountess was added to the notes.
69b.g7:
She is too pure and innocent...
which may not be a good thing.
69b.g8:
The will of a human can be strong, 
and fearful!
69b.g9:
As the old saying goes, 
where there's a will there's a way!
69b.g10:
(I don't think it's properly used 
here...)
69b.g12: ...I think I need a larger vocabulary.
69b.g14:
Mirabell is a great lady!
She saved her family!
69b.d1: I need to find that guy!
69b.a1:
Are these her imagination, or her past...
Or a prophecy...
69b.a2:
Does his presence mean...
he stays in Mirabell's heart?
69b.a3:
The hope and sorrow she buries here...
Little by little, they are being revealed...
69b.a4:
Damn it! How could the wedding 
have become such a mess?
69b.a7: I have to talk to him!

70w.m2:
Is this supposed to be a joke?!
It's not funny!!
70w.m3:
And Mirabell...
I don't think anyone could do this.
70w.m4:
Though there is someone who is 
very unpleasant and suspicious...
70w.m6: Why are you locked up here...
70w.t1:
Sorry, I came in without 
telling you...
70w.t4:
You found out the true face of Marquess 
Ernest before the wedding, and taught 
him a lesson!...Didn't you?!
70w.t8: You saw her...You saw it all...
70w.t9:
But...You shouldn't be here...
I said you shouldn't come in......
70w.t14:
I haven't seen something so evil
for a long time...
70w.t15:
No, I can't be caught...
Mirabell! We have to escape!

75d.t001: There is...no way to escape now.
75d.t002: You are going to die...\|like him.
75d.t003:
Why did you have to be here, 
Charlotte? I told you not to...\!
How do you like my room then?
75d.t004:
Charming. You see, It allows me to 
know more about you...
75d.t005: and the world of humans and witches.
75d.t006:
There is neither a murder nor 
a wedding ceremony today.
75d.t007:
And of course, 
I'm not going to die here, either.
75d.t010:
You'll be very sorry 
if you're merely bluffing!
75d.t015:
Do you know what you are talking 
about?!
75d.t017:
The wedding of Mirabell and 
Ernest the Marquess...
75d.t022:
You don't have a clue, yet you 
are acting like a know-it-all...
75d.t025:
Haha...now I prefer to imagine 
your death!
75d.t026:
The room was created by Mirabell...
according to her memory.
75d.t027: Therefore, in the past there was...
75d.t031:
It was a shame that the wedding 
was never held...
75d.t032:
I was looking forward to 
my wedding dress so much!
75d.t033:
Heehee...do you really think so, 
Charlotte?
75d.t035:
No! I mean...it was impossible 
for nothing to have happened!
75d.t036:
Mirabell had experienced a murder...
The victim was...
75d.t043:
No...This is the incident that 
Mirabell SHOWS to us,
while the truth is...
75d.t044:
I have no idea about 
what you are saying!
75d.t046:
Oh...You discovered the other 
incident behind the wedding as well...
75d.t047:
Yes...But it is \c[2]Mirabell's\c[0] 
past that we have to figure out 
at the moment...
75d.t050:
I hate you! Hate you!
You...you are accusing me 
of a murder!
75d.t051: You knew it was their fault...
75d.t052:
You saw I was locked up...
covered in blood!
75d.t053:
However, in fact you were not 
the victim...Though you consider 
yourself as one.
75d.t054:
That's why "Mirabell being murdered" 
was shown in front of us...
75d.t055:
It was only a stage set up by you...
rather than the truth of the past.
75d.t056:
Nobody is allowed to enter your room 
because you don't want anyone to know 
that you...
75d.t060:
Excuse me? You were just saying 
I wasn't the victim!
75d.t061:
Sure! 
I got it right earlier...
75d.t062:
I didn't! It was my wish to dress up 
and have a gorgeous wedding ceremony!
75d.t063:
(Indeed it was very unlikely to 
happen...)
75d.t064:
Mirabell...
You were a human. Am I right?
75d.t066: (The evidence that Mirabell was a human is...)
75d.t067:
No...it has nothing to do with 
Mirabell's identity.
75d.t068: Mirabell was a noble lady...a human.
75d.t069:
Evangeline...Have you sensed it, 
more or less...?
75d.t071: So you do hate me for a reason...!
75d.t072:
As for how you turned to a witch...
I guess it was because you...
75d.t077:
However, the broken relationship was 
only the start...The more important 
thing is that you...
75d.t080:
(Mirabell wasn't dead...
She is still alive now.)
75d.t081:
You lost your mind...and killed your 
fiancee, after knowing what was behind 
the marriage.
75d.t082:
For he destroyed your dream of 
true love...
75d.t083:
I believe then you traded your soul 
to a monster, and became one of us...
75d.t084:
...Yes. It's true.
The devil...saw my soul.
75d.t085:
Though Ernest couldn't. 
None of them could.
75d.t086:
In the eyes of my father and my 
fiancee...I was nothing more than 
something pretty to be traded...
75d.t087:
They never treated me like a human 
anyway!
75d.t088:
I was longing for love...
I was wishing for happiness...
75d.t089: How could I be the one to blame?!
75d.t091:
Because only till death do us part! 
Hahahaha!
75d.t094:
You think you can just break 
into my room, and lecture me 
about my past?
75d.t095: I will not forgive you, either!!!
75d.t098:
Mirabell! Do you...
Do you remember the words of...?!
75d.t103: They...they hope you can be happy!
75d.t104:
...Is there any point?
The past cannot be changed anymore...
75d.t105: His words are nothing but lies!
75d.t106:
The room is created from your 
magic...sharing the same consciousness 
with you...
75d.t107:
However, when the unicorn 
saw me at the beginning...
75d.t108:
"It's wonderful...Thank you."
She said so...didn't she?!
75d.t109:
Your room allowed me to go through 
the doors...It allowed me to find 
the Mirabell locked in the cage...
75d.t110:
It's your wish for someone to 
understand you...
75d.t111:
You have been waiting for someone 
who can reach this place...and set 
you free from the cage, right?!
75d.t115:
Yes, I do! 
I know what bothers you...
75d.t116: I know...the meaning of that answer.
75d.t121:
(Stay calm...
It has to be the \c[2]answer\c[0]...)
75d.t122:
In the story...a bat belongs to 
neither birds nor beasts...
75d.t123:
And you believe you are not the same 
as the other witches, yet not a human 
anymore, either...
75d.t124: That's why you don't talk to us...
75d.t125:
But you ARE one of us...!
So...
75d.t127:
You...an arrogant child...
Born in a witch family...
75d.t128:
How can you understand the pain of 
being isolated?!
75d.t131:
I...\|
I'm a half human, too...
75d.be2: I don't want to listen anymore!
75d.be3:
It's all your fault...
You shouldn't have broken in, neither 
should you talk nonsense...
75d.be7:
I'm sorry...
But I was just hoping to spend 
some time with you...
75d.be10:
Since you like my room so much...
then don't leave!
75d.be11:
I'll have wedding ceremonies as long as 
the weather is nice!
75d.be13: You can always be my precious guest!
75d.be16:
I'm sorry! Mirabell!\|
I was trying to be your friend...
75d.be17:
All I have done is merely reveal your secret...
yet I am unable to help with it.
75d.be18:
I can only run away...
leaving you in the deepest pain.
75d.be19:
I have to run...run...
back to the normal world.\|
...What have I done?!
75d.bee2:
Oh, I didn't expect to have something 
in common with Evangeline!
75d.bee3:
Haha...I thought you were only 
a spoiled little princess...
75d.bee4: I have to say it's a big surprise!
75d.bee5:
You can easily destroy anything 
with your power...
75d.bee7:
Then why are you shutting yourself 
in this dark room, killing your dead 
fiancee again and again...
75d.bee8:
It'll be much more exciting to 
put an end to the whole world...
75d.bee9: End the world? You are crazy...
75d.bee10:
Crazy?! ME?!
Look at yourself! And your room!
75d.bee15: I fled. And told Andrea about Mirabell...
75d.bee16:
However, it was only a normal room when we 
opened her door again.
75d.bee17:
Mirabell and Evangeline were gone.
And so was the book in the library...
75d.bee18:
It'll be much more exciting to put an end 
to the whole world...
75d.bee19:
Evangeline's voice, as well as her cold face...
lingered in my head.
75d.bee20: It would be my fault if anything happened...
75d.bee21:
Fear, and the laughter of witches, 
became my ever-lasting nightmare.
75d.bee22:
Maybe...before long, in this world...\|
there would no longer be any bright days.

76c.t3:
This...is not right.\|
Both of us know it...don't we?
76c.t4:
You...go back to your cage!
Don't you dare stop me!!
76c.t5:
Can you hear me...Charlotte?\!
Thank you for setting me free...
I wish...I could have known you earlier.

77f.t01:
That's enough...
I...I don't want to run anymore...
77f.t02:
Are you alright? We have to run!
If she catches us...
77f.t03:
I'm fine...
I...I think I can stop her.
77f.t05:
The crime I committed can never 
be erased...
77f.t07:
I'm grateful that you took me 
with you...
77f.t08:
I...I believe Mirabell hasn't turned 
to an evil monster...
77f.t09:
There is still something pure and 
innocent left in her heart...
77f.t12:
...Thank you.
I'm glad to be free again...
77f.t13:
So it's time...
to confront my sin...
77f.t14:
This...is not right.\|
Both of us know it...don't we?
77f.t15:
I'm free now...
both of us can be free now.
77f.t16:
I know it's difficult when you 
have to face your guilt...
77f.t17:
It's even more painful to admit that you 
cannot be happy...
77f.t18:
However, in this endless nightmare...
how can we find hope and consolation?
To live, or to die...?
77f.t19: I'm sorry...It was all my fault.
77f.t20: Allow me to end all of this...Please?
77f.t23: There is a price for being a witch...
77f.t24:
I can never have peace with this 
cursed life...The nightmare of guilt 
and pain has been too long.
77f.t25:
No matter how many years I can live...
there is nothing else for me except 
misery and emptiness.
77f.t26:
It can hardly be called 'living', 
I guess?
77f.t27: You...you are too much of a softie!
77f.t29:
I think Charlotte broke the curse 
by unlocking the cage...
77f.t30: I can finally...leave as a human.
77f.t32:
Say sorry to Andrea for me...
for I can't join her dinner.
77f.t40: I'm happy to die as a human...
77f.t41:
I was a human!
I shouldn't be here...
77f.t45:
I...I tried so hard making friends...
and saving you!
77f.t46:
You were just released from the 
cage...and you've already beat 
your evil self!
77f.t47: But...I'm glad to die as a human...
77f.t49:
You may still have the chance 
to be happy in the future...!
77f.t50: I don't want you to die...!!!
77f.t51:
What should I do...
What should I do...?!
77f.t54:
Mirabell will not die, 
but fall asleep for a hundred of years!
77f.t55:
I'm sorry, Mirabell...\|
I cannot accept your death.
77f.t56:
It was only the first time we met.
You can't just leave like this after giving me 
such a hard time...!
77f.t58: I don't want to lose a friend.
77f.t59:
We could dress up...play with dolls, 
and fly above the sweet clouds...
77f.t60:
Let's have another party...
when we meet again.\|
Shall we?

79pastparty.e4t001:
So...here are all the witches we have
in the world now.
79pastparty.e4t002:
I guess it would be nice to greet
each other...After all, the survivors
should stay together.
79pastparty.e4t003:
Stay together? What for?
Wait for the chance to strike back?
79pastparty.e4t004:
Evangeline...You know it's impossible
now. And...
I won't let another war start.
79pastparty.e4t005:
Since we have already lost the
battles...Maybe it's time to think
about how to deal with the world
from now on...
79pastparty.e4t007:
Humph...You gathered us for such
a boring reason?!
79pastparty.e4t008:
Surrender, hide, and then watch
this despicable world day after day...
79pastparty.e4t011:
We shouldn't fight...since you are
my guest. The \c[2]war\c[0] started like
this...exactly.
79pastparty.e4t012:
We weren't destroyed by humans...
but by ourselves, in fact.
79pastparty.e4t013:
If we need a change...
the first thing should be
"not killing each other".
79pastparty.e4t014:
Can't we just sit down and
have a cup of tea?
79pastparty.e4t016:
I don't think we can keep on living
if we don't change the "\c[2]monstrous\c[0]"
ideas.
79pastparty.e4t017:
Change...?
Are we still monsters, if we change?
79pastparty.e4t018:
Hmmm...I'd say "monsters of the new
era", if you ask me.
79pastparty.e4t019:
Nonsense!
I'll never accept your new era!!
79pastparty.e4t020:
...It's actually the other reason
for the death of the monsters.
79pastparty.e4t021:
They couldn't accept the world...
and then...simply disappeared.
79pastparty.e4t022:
However, we are alive.
Why not have a try...?
79pastparty.e4t023:
Try...? What you mean is
"you have no choice", isn't it?!
79pastparty.e4t024:
With your whole family dead...
You think now it's your turn to be
the witch leader?!
79pastparty.e4t025:
I won't change for you...
I won't compromise to this world,
either!
79pastparty.e4t026:
Then what's your plan?
What do you want?!
79pastparty.e4t028:
I'm hoping to set a new order for
the witches...and the monsters,
to protect the survivors.
79pastparty.e4t029:
I know exactly what I am doing...
and I'm telling you...
79pastparty.e4t030:
If you dare to ruin our lives,
before you do...\!
I'll kill you.
79pastparty.e4t031: \c[1]Refuse the New World\c[0] was added to the notes.
79pastparty.e4t032: \c[1]Andrea's Motive\c[0] was added to the notes.
79pastparty.e4t034:
Was that the first tea party...?
Oh dear, I was nervous...
79pastparty.e4t035:
Evangeline was fighting Andrea
from the beginning...
79pastparty.e4t036: Why is she always so upset?

80pastevan.e3t003:
Great!
I'm looking for the survivors...
80pastevan.e3t004: You are one of us...Am I correct?
80pastevan.e3t006:
Well...
I hope we can have a better life,
since the war is over now.
80pastevan.e3t009:
You don't know the end of us "having a better life"...
Peace is impossible if only WE wish for it.
80pastevan.e3t010:
Haha...You'll have to burn down
this world and start over, if you
hope to live on.
80pastevan.e3t011:
Or smash it, blow everything up...
Whatever suits you.
80pastevan.e3t012:
No...I'd rather not.
Because I prefer peace.
80pastevan.e3t013:
You know...there are still witches
left. And I guess all of us have lost
someone in the war.
80pastevan.e3t014:
I'm holding a tea party for the ladies...
Will you accept my invitation?
80pastevan.e3t016:
Aren't you curious about them?
I heard you've been alone...
80pastevan.e3t017:
I am...indeed.
Without many memories before the war,
I don't think I've ever met any witches
besides my mother and my sister...
80pastevan.e3t018:
Then I went to her tea party,
which I regretted so much.\| It was extremely boring.
80pastevan.e3t019:
Why was she always smiling...?
Even she knew I wouldn't agree...
I wouldn't even listen.
80pastevan.e3t020: Her smile disturbed me so much.
80pastevan.e3t021:
Control freak.
It was engrained deep within her and her family.
I know I will aggravate her someday.
80pastevan.e3t022:
...So that this ridiculous tea party doesn't
have to go on.
80pastevan.e3t024: And they fell apart from the inside...
80pastevan.e3t025: It is true even when we are so few...
80pastevan.e3t026:
I'm afraid the peace is too fragile
to last long.
80pastevan.e3t027:
Evangeline is going to break it...
sooner or later.
80pastevan.e3t030: If so...what was she waiting for?
80pastevan.e3t031:
If she meant to destroy...
it wouldn't take her so long to act.
80pastevan.e3t032:
So...you believe there is
kindness in her?
80pastevan.e3t034:
You are too young to see evil or
cruelty...
80pastevan.e3t035: The real world is not a fairy tale.
80pastevan.e3t037:
I-...I have to go now.
I'll figure it out...

82cot.1003: Maybe I should come back later...
82cot.1004:
(And I need to ask Andrea 
about \c[2]it\c[0]...)
82cot.1005: \c[1]Evangeline's Cottage\c[0] was added to the notes!
82cot.2001: Maybe I should have a look around...
82cot.3003:
You won't die...
Live...and see how this world is going to be...
82cot.3005: \c[1]Daria's Curse\c[0] was added to the notes.
82cot.ir002:
It's impossible. We are witches...
They will kill us.
Mother told us to be careful.
82cot.ir003:
But it's so boring!
I want to join them too...
82cot.ir004:
Fine...I know we are not humans.
Where are the other witches then?
82cot.ir006:
I hope I can be an explorer in 
the future...and look for monsters 
around the world!
82cot.ir007:
Then we can be friends with humans...
They don't have to be afraid of us if 
we don't hurt them, right?
82cot.ir009:
The reason that we couldn't share the world 
with them was not only because we had the power...
82cot.ir011:
Similarity created affiliation.
The different would be exiled...
82cot.ir012:
Even the witches had treated their own kind 
in this way...
82cot.ir013:
Irina...you had this idea because we were living 
a peaceful life, with our family.
Because what was inside your heart...was love.
82cot.ir014:
It turned out to be...\|
Love killed you, and our parents.
82cot.ir016:
The love killed her family...
What does it mean?...
82cot.ir017: \c[1]Memories about Irina\c[0] was added to the notes!
82cot.e7t001:
There is another house 
inside this room...
82cot.e7t002:
Why is there a cottage built 
in her palace?
82cot.sign2:
It's in a language that I don't 
know...

83cl.yellow: Picked up the book with a \c[6]yellow cover\c[0]!
83cl.red: Picked up the book with a \c[2]red cover\c[0]!
83cl.green: Picked up the book with a \c[3]green cover\c[0]!
83cl.help1:
Help Andrea clean up her library in 90 seconds!
You can only take one book at a time...
83cl.help2:
\c[6]The book with a yellow cover: the LEFT of Bookshelf #2.\c[0]
\c[2]The book with a red cover: the RIGHT of Bookshelf #2.\c[0]
\c[3]The book with a green cover: the MIDDLE of Bookshelf #5.\c[0]
83cl.put: Put the book on the shelf?
83cl.left2:
The left of Bookshelf #2. 
These may still be useful...
83cl.right2:
The right of Bookshelf #2. 
These are difficult for her to throw away...
83cl.mid5:
The middle of Bookshelf #5. 
These do not even make sense...at least to me.
83cl.kitty4001:
Actually...this library doesn't 
even have a way out...or in!
83cl.kitty4002: How did this cat get here...?
83cl.cat: A stuffed toy cat, looking familiar.

84fin.002:
Andrea...You know it's impossible.
You are just trying to control all 
of us...
84fin.b5001:
I will...
not tolerant you anymore.
84fin.b5003:
Charlotte...
You said you were helping me.
84fin.b5004:
I appreciate it...
Though...apparently, 
you have no idea how.
84fin.b5005:
It's better to leave the problems 
to the grown-ups.
84fin.b5006:
I had enough! I...I shouldn't have 
been here in the first place!
84fin.b5007:
I don't understand...
why you are trying to defend this disgusting world...
84fin.b5010:
...and I don't think She will 
return this time.
84fin.b5011:
...If she lays a finger on any 
innocent people,
84fin.b5013:
(There is no chance to give it 
back to her anymore...)
84fin.b5014:
The world has changed since the tea party.\|
Only Renee was excited about any disasters 
that might happen...
but even she disappeared before long.
84fin.b5015:
We probably have to fight now...for the peace.\|Andrea was right.
This is not a fairy tale.
84fin.b5016: Maybe I will be a true hero\| when we meet again...
84fin.004:
Witches are cruel by nature.
We will start to fight again 
if no one is able to lead us...
84fin.006:
Because it was my fault that my 
family's leadership was broken...
...by my betrayal, followed by the 
destruction of the monsters...
84fin.007:
Therefore, I have to gather all 
of you...and take responsibility.
84fin.008:
I will destroy you, 
if you have to fight me...
84fin.009:
Use your brain...Why can't you just 
listen to her? Is there anything you 
can do other than accept reality?!
84fin.010:
We accept Andrea...not because of submission, 
but because we agree with her.
84fin.012:
I...
But Evangeline also has reasons...
84fin.013:
Wow! Finally!
Burn down the world, Evangeline!
Hahahahaha!!
84fin.016:
(This must be what Vanessa had 
foreseen!...)
84fin.017:
(I'm the only one that knows what 
happened in Evangeline's past...)
84fin.b6001:
I said...
I would not tolerant you anymore.
84fin.b6003:
It's over now.\|
There won't be more anger, more quarrels, or threats.
84fin.b6004:
We have peace now...after killing an evil witch.
She was even once one of us...
which makes the peace more precious.
84fin.b6005: So...all of us are satisfied now.
84fin.b6006:
And Evangeline...
who couldn't find happiness in this world, 
will not be sad, nor alone anymore.
84fin.a002:
Evangeline...I'm the one that 
you will have to fight.
84fin.a004:
No! Please trust me!
I know what's going on...
I know what happened!
84fin.ne001: I know it's hard to accept.
84fin.ne002:
Will she just go on living in this "peaceful" world?
It's her family's wish.\!Or will she destroy everything? 
After all it's her desire...
84fin.ne003:
The truth hidden in the past is revealed now...
Seeing Evangeline's twisted face..
all of a sudden, I lost my words.
84fin.ne007: ...What else can I do with you?
84fin.ne010: You remind me of Irina...a lot...
84fin.ne012:
Because...I wanted to protect you!
I was probably the only one who 
could do it!
84fin.ne013:
Nonsense. 
Stop acting like a hero...
84fin.ne014:
Hem...I do think things would turn 
nasty without Charlotte.
84fin.ne015:
It's true that you wouldn't hurt her!
There are hardly any witches that use 
their fists...
84fin.ne018: I should give this back to you!
84fin.ne021: You have something to show off now...
84fin.ne022:
...Telling everyone that you've 
saved the world once.
84fin.ne025:
...I'll be here next time.\!
If you have more to say...
84fin.ne026:
It's a promise then!
See you!
84fin.te001: "This is not a battlefield...It's my home."
84fin.te002:
Thoses were the last words...
of your mother, Daria.
84fin.te003: How could you know such things?!
84fin.te004:
I said I knew something that 
you didn't...
84fin.te005:
Do you know what your village 
is like today?
84fin.te006:
Heroes, witches...The past has 
become fairy tales now.
84fin.te007:
There are no more battles...
because the hero realised...
84fin.te008:
...you also had family...and lived 
a life of peace and quiet.
84fin.te009:
Are you telling me...
the murderers could understand...?
84fin.te010:
Yes...they did. Though unfortunately 
it was after Mrs. Daria's death...
84fin.te011:
However...Evangeline, you are still 
alive. Your mother wouldn't want to 
see you destroying anything!
84fin.te012:
The children that Irina saved 
lived a peaceful life...
84fin.te013:
The snow monster she protected is 
still living there near the village.
84fin.te015:
Sure. Villagers tell the folklore 
of snow monsters, for fun, when they 
found carrots missing.
84fin.te016:
Sniechek, the monster, visits the 
village during the Snow Festival, 
hiding among the snowmen and enjoying 
it as well...
84fin.te018:
He has never left...
until everybody forgets the 
existence of monsters...
84fin.te019:
Because he hopes there is still 
someone there remembering Irina...
84fin.te020:
After all these years...
Monsters, humans...
84fin.te021:
They all live the life...
that Irina was wishing for.
84fin.te024:
And stop torturing yourself 
any longer...
84fin.te025: I want to be their friend!
84fin.te026:
Maybe I can be an explorer! Look for monsters 
around the world...
84fin.te027: Someday...we can get along with humans!
84fin.te028:
You don't believe me?
Let's wait and see...
84fin.te029:
Promise me you won't shout at my human friends, 
if I manage to make any!
84fin.te030:
...Alright! 
Shall we go home and have a hot drink?
84fin.b7010: Shut up if you don't know anything!!
84fin.b7014:
Pain.
Blood in my eyes.
It's warm.
84fin.b7015:
Spells, curses, seals...
They can restrict a witch's power,
84fin.b7016: Yet they can be broken as well.
84fin.b7017:
When the anger buried in her heart for 
hundreds of years was released...
84fin.b7019: ...It was my last memory of this world.
84fin.e26t003:
......\|
This is what you think of me?!
84fin.e26t008:
Excuse me? 
Is Evangeline too stupid 
to cast a spell?
84fin.e26t011:
(It's not a good time to make 
jokes...)
84fin.e26t012:
I think Evangeline's power is 
very unstable...therefore she 
couldn't do any actual harm.
84fin.e26t013:
I'm afraid this is what restricts 
her power...
84fin.e26t014: (She is also scary when not talking!)
84fin.e26t016:
...cursed you before her death,
saying that you shouldn't hurt 
anyone...
84fin.e26t019:
I do!
I knew the curse shouldn't 
be there after she was gone...
84fin.e26t021:
However, Evangeline, you are 
still affected by the past...
84fin.e26t022:
...so that you don't, or I'd say, 
can't hurt others.
84fin.e26t023:
Evangeline can't hurt others? 
I don't think so.
84fin.e26t027:
...Why are you trying so hard 
to defend her?
84fin.e26t029:
Indeed...you attacked our village, 
even without a reason.
84fin.e26t032:
Andrea, at least you should 
understand!
84fin.e26t034:
Evangeline is always upset...
I can't see any difference...
84fin.e26t037:
(The time when Evangeline 
attacked Xaviera's village...)
84fin.e26t038:
There are actually two Evangelines...
One is very scary, the other...
84fin.e26t040:
I guess there is only one 
scary Evangeline.
84fin.e26t041:
(The time when Evangeline 
attacked Xaviera's village...)
84fin.e26t043:
Yes. When Evangeline found her 
powers to have returned to her...
84fin.e26t046: Xaviera is a mage from another world...
84fin.e26t047:
Oh! No wonder your taste in 
sweets is so odd...
84fin.e26t048:
Grandma...you should be the last 
person to judge someone else's taste!
84fin.e26t050:
We have a more important 
topic at the moment...
84fin.e26t051:
I guess, with her unstable powers, 
Evangeline accidentally reached a 
different space...
84fin.e26t052:
When she realised it was not 
the same world...her power went 
out of control.
84fin.e26t053:
Has Evangeline... 
really been cursed... 
all this time?
84fin.e26t055:
Though Evangeline has this terrible 
temper, she never \c[2]actually attacked\c[0] 
anyone except in Xaviera's village.
84fin.e26t059:
The power which has been holding 
Evangeline back...is from...
84fin.e26t060:
Do you really believe 
she can do that...?
84fin.e26t061:
I'd say it will be much easier 
if I can seal her...
84fin.e26t064: Where did you learn that name...?
84fin.e26t066:
He is dead...
It was only after his death that 
I could be free again...
84fin.27t002:
You don't want to admit that 
Daria is dead...
which keeps the curse...
84fin.27t004:
It is true that deep in your heart, 
you don't want to hurt anyone...\|
because...
84fin.27t006: No…! I was trying to say...
84fin.27t007:
Your family...
They would've rather given up 
than to start another battle...
84fin.27t008:
Their belief, their hope, 
and the memories with them...
84fin.27t009:
...are the only things they left 
for you.\| Though these bring you 
constant pain and anger...
84fin.27t010: You are also in here...aren't you?
84fin.27t012: I think I can open it.
84fin.27t013:
The one you loved most in the whole 
world...Her wish is protecting you, 
yet torturing you...
84fin.27t014:
This is the most precious, as well as 
the saddest memory for Evangeline...\|
Her family.
84fin.27t015: So this is the lost item...
84fin.27t016:
Yes. And it's also the thing that 
keeps her sanity...
84fin.27t017:
It's all she has from her family 
now. The world means nothing to her 
if her last treasure is gone...
84fin.27t018:
Ah...if that's the case...\|
You should be more careful about 
saying it out loud...
84fin.27t019:
When Evangeline realizes it...\|
the subconscious holding her 
back will probably disappear at 
the same time...
84fin.27t020:
She may recover her full power at 
any moment...And it's very unlikely 
that she can control it...
84fin.27t024: Who asked you to spy on my past?!
84fin.27t025:
Do I need your sympathy?
What can you change now that 
you know about this?...?! 
Nothing!!
84fin.27t031:
Evangeline...
You know it's no use shouting at me...
84fin.27t032:
It's just because you are angry.
There is not even anyone left to 
avenge...
84fin.27t034:
I know the person that you hated most 
is nobody but...
84fin.27t035:
Sure...
and this awful tea party...
84fin.27t036:
No no no, please calm down!
I was wrong! My fault!
84fin.27t038:
Do you mean it?! 
You have gone this far!
84fin.27t039:
Of course not!
(It'll be all over if 
I provoke her again...)
84fin.27t040:
I know...The one that you can 
never forgive...is yourself.
84fin.27t041:
I didn't stop Irina's innocent ideas...
I didn't save them from the humans...
84fin.27t042:
I even took my mother's last strength...
I became the one being protected.
84fin.27t043:
I was trying so hard to throw away their ridiculous 
"love" towards this world. I longed for the power of 
destruction...\!However, I was unable to end the world 
that they lived in and died for.
84fin.27t044:
The only things left...are wrath and regret...
haunting me...year after year.
84fin.27t045:
I don't know how much longer I can keep them...
I don't know when they will lose control...

85village2.get: There is a crack on the fence...
85village2.e31t001:
The snowman looks familiar...
This girl is...
85village2.e31t002:
I'd say it's a snow sculpture
rather than a "snowman"...
85village2.e31t003:
And...I don't think it's made by
human hands.
85village2.e31t004:
(The sculpture of Irina with the
carving of magic...There must be
something left in this village.)
85village2.e33t002:
I think this is a park...
There are even more snowmen here...
85village2.e45t001: There are some words that I don't understand...

86village1.e2t002:
This is the village where
Evangeline used to live...
86village1.jar1: Food is stored in the jar.
86village1.e14t001: There is a small snowman in front of the house.

87extra.amelia002:
Amelia...It's a pleasure to
finally meet you!
87extra.amelia2002:
............\|
Is there anything I can help you with,
Miss Vanessa?
87extra.amelia2004:
What do you think about being
a magical girl...?
87extra.amelia3001:
"Magical Girl~Pumpkin!" is my current
serial manga...
87extra.amelia3002:
Though I probably shouldn't be
the one who says so...
I think you'll enjoy it!
87extra.amelia3003:
Sure...It sounds like fun!
I'll read it...
87extra.evan003:
...I went to the concert!
Isn't it obvious?!
87extra.evan2002:
Will you stop staring at me?!
You wear human T-shirts all the 
time!!
87extra.evan2003:
...And I only wear this because
of Stephanie's concert!
Do you have a problem with that?!
87extra.evan2004:
No...of course not!
It suits you well!!
87extra.evan2005: Why do you think it SUITS me?!?!
87extra.evan3001:
...I didn't expect to meet \c[2]her\c[0]
again at the concert.
87extra.evan3002:
(Oh...She is still not getting along
with Xaviera...)
87extra.evan3003:
How did she become a fan of
Stephanie's?!
She doesn't even live here...
Can she really appreciate her music?!
87extra.evan3004:
And how did she travel here...?!
It shouldn't have happened...
She's a rule-breaker! Why doesn't
Andrea say a word about her?!
87extra.evan3005:
She even asked if I would queue for
the concert goods if she couldn't
make it next time...
87extra.evan3006:
I don't care for concert goods!
CDs are more important!
87extra.evan3007:
(She has changed a lot...
yet still terrifying.)
87extra.stephan2001:
It's amazing that you have
become a rock star...
87extra.stephan2002:
You are also doing well it seems...\|
Well...you've found your place
in the human world some time ago,
haven't you?
87extra.stephan2003:
I'm looking forward to
the next volume...
87extra.stephan2004:
You are reading my manga, too?!
I'm so happy to hear that!
87extra.stephan3002:
I have to admit...
music is easier for me...
than talking...
87extra.stephan3003:
Now you have loyal fans among
both humans and witches!
87extra.stephan3004:
............\|
It's my pleasure...
to sing for them...
87extra.cathy002:
You probably have noticed that
here is another room...
It should be prepared by now!
87extra.polly001:
It's nice to see you again,
Miss Vanessa!
87extra.polly002: I have collected a lot of books...
87extra.charl001: Nice to see you again, Vanessa!
87extra.charl003:
Heehee...We actually talked about
the first tea party a while ago...
87extra.charl005:
And it has been peaceful...
Thanks to you!
87extra.charl2001:
I heard you had moved out
of Marilyn's place...
87extra.charl2002:
Yes, I did! Though I'm still less
than a hundred years old!
87extra.charl2003: Don't worry, because I'm a genius!
87extra.charl3001:
This is my maid, Amelia!
I've been looking forward to
introducing her!
87extra.mira001: I slept for a long time...
87extra.mira002: It's great to see you finally wake up!
87extra.mira2001:
I thought you were going to
sleep for a hundred years...
87extra.mira2002:
Somehow I woke up early...
Maybe because Charlotte wasn't
strong enough...
87extra.mira2003: She was a little girl back then...
87extra.mira3002:
Thanks! I heard you know a lot
about popular items...
among the young people.
87extra.mira3003:
Can I go shopping with you
some other day?...
87extra.mira3004:
Sure! Though I don't really
"go" shopping...
87extra.mira3005: Let me teach you how to shop online!
87extra.renee2001:
Do you have a Great Devil
in your manga?
87extra.renee2002:
Well...
If you mean a villain...
87extra.renee2003:
The Great Devil conquered the world,
and then lived happily ever after...!
87extra.renee2004:
No, no, no...
It's a shojo manga!
87extra.renee3001:
Make a manga about the Great Devil
next time!
87extra.renee3002:
Renee will buy three copies!
Like how Evangeline buys the CDs!
87extra.renee3004:
So that the humans will know
how great and terrible the devil
can be...Hahahahaha!!
87extra.xavi002:
It's really fantastic to
see you again!
87extra.xavi2001:
I'm here for the concert!
Stephanie is brilliant...
87extra.xavi2002: Your world is full of fun!
87extra.xavi2003:
Though I guess it's not easy
to travel here...
87extra.xavi2004:
Time and distance will never
be a problem as long as there
is passion and love!
87extra.xavi3001:
I hope I can come here again...
you know, the concert goods
are charming!
87extra.xavi3002:
(I actually don't know how
you can bring them back...)
87extra.e12p2t001:
Charlotte has moved out...
It gets a little boring.
87extra.e12p2t002: She doesn't even write to me...
87extra.e12p2t003:
Maybe you can get a mobile phone!
It's really convenient...
87extra.e12p3t001:
You are already used to
the human world...
87extra.e12p3t002: Sure! I'm happy with my job!
87extra.e12p3t003:
I have nothing to complain about
as long as I can keep drawing!
87extra.e13p2t001: I hope you are having a good time!
87extra.e13p3t001:
It hasn't been long since the last
tea party though...
87extra.e13p3t002: Well, this one is for Stephanie!
87extra.e13p3t003:
I didn't expect Xaviera to be
here...for her concert!
87extra.e13p3t004: It's so nice to see everyone again...
87extra.e13p4t001: Do you also listen to Stephanie's music?
87extra.e13p4t002:
I'm still not sure about how to
appreciate it...
87extra.e13p4t003:
But I'm proud to see she is loved
by so many people!
87extra.e32t001:
There are the Normal Ending, the True Ending,
7 Bad Endings and 9 Dead Endings (Game Over).
The collected Ending CGs can be viewed in the
CG Gallery.
87extra.e32t002:
Extra will be unlocked when the Normal Ending OR
the True Ending is achieved.\! When TE is completed,
The characters will gather in the room again, and
the door of "Character Gallery" will be unlocked.
87extra.e32t003:
How to achieve the True Ending:\!
In Chapter 4, \c[2]go back to the reality\c[0] (leave
the room) during the investigation of the cottage in
\c[2]Evangeline's memory\c[0].
87extra.e32t004: If not, it goes to the Normal Ending route.
87extra.e33t001:
View the CG Gallery?
(If \c[2]Auto Message\c[0] is on, it is recommended
to turn it off in OPTION.)
87extra.e34t001:
About hidden contents and collectables:\!
The pieces, food, profiles, side quests WILL NOT
influence the story.
87extra.e34t002:
There are 36 pieces hidden in the game. Three CGs
will be unlocked if all of them are collected.\!
There will be hints of the pieces and ingredients
in a second gameplay.
87extra.e34t003:
The choice concerning Mirabell will not affect the story.
However, she will be in the Extra if she didn't die.
87extra.e34t004:
There are 13 side/hidden quests in the game; The ones with *
will be unlocked when the related quests are completed\!

(6) Unnecessary Feelings

(9) The Unbeatable Renee

89snowy.e2t001:
Who made a snowman in such
a place...?
89snowy.e2t004:
I...!
I've never done anything evil!
89snowy.e2p2t003:
A snow monster...That's probably what
you would call me...
I've been living here for many years...
89snowy.e2p2t004:
Anyway! I know I'm a monster...
But I've never done anything evil!
89snowy.e2p2t005:
Neither do I have much power...
Please...don't hurt me...
89snowy.e2p2t007:
...Irina.
The most well-made snowman is
a sculpture of her...Right?
89snowy.e2p2t010:
Why was such a snowman
made in a human village...?
89snowy.e2p2t012:
Now it's the Snow Festival...
That's my work...which has won
the first prize.
89snowy.e2p2t013:
The villager who makes the best
snowman can win the best carrot...
They are still looking for the
sculptor.
89snowy.e2p2t014: (It seems a big event in the village...)
89snowy.e2p2t015:
They know her...
as the snow fairy in the stories.
89snowy.e2p2t016:
Witches were killed by heroes...
and then heroes died with the
passing of time.
89snowy.e2p2t017: All of them have become stories.
89snowy.e2p2t018: I'm the only one left here...
89snowy.e2p2t019:
Was Irina killed by a hero?
What happened?
89snowy.e2p2t021:
I thought the snowmen in the
village looked fun...I was hoping
to join them...
89snowy.e2p2t022:
However, I was noticed by the villagers...
Humans at that time were furious...
knowing the existence of the monsters...
89snowy.e2p2t023:
I was chased...
by a group of children,
to the forest...
89snowy.e2p2t024:
The forest was dangerous to humans...
Irina...was protecting them.
89snowy.e2p2t025:
Yet when they discovered
she was a witch...
89snowy.e2p2t026:
There was a hero in the village...
Then her whole family...was......
89snowy.e2p2t027:
It was my fault that Irina died.
Both of us...regretted.
89snowy.e2p2t028:
That's why we make snowmen
every year...
89snowy.e2p2t032:
After the tragedy...
I was found by Mr. Hero anyway...
89snowy.e2p2t033:
But he did nothing...
other than talked to me...
89snowy.e2p2t034:
He...killed them...
Irina...and her parents...\|
But...
89snowy.e2p2t035:
"This is not a battlefield...
It's my home."
89snowy.e2p2t036:
These were the last words...
of Irina's mother.
89snowy.e2p2t037:
Hearing that...instead of
taking the dying lady's life,
Mr. Hero ran away.
89snowy.e2p2t038:
And...doubted himself,
for the first time.
89snowy.e2p2t039:
(...The war had ended by that time.
Only because they \c[2]were\c[0] witches...)
89snowy.e2p2t040:
(I didn't know such tragedy was hidden
in the cottage...in her heart.)
89snowy.e2p2t041: There were no more witches to hunt...
89snowy.e2p2t042:
Mr. Hero let me stay here in
the forest, saying that he didn't
want to fight anymore...
89snowy.e2p2t043:
He started to build snowmen in the
village...so that I wouldn't be found
even if I went there.
89snowy.e2p2t045: It's a safe place for you now...
89snowy.e2p2t047:
Irina saved my life.
I hope in this forest...
89snowy.e2p2t048:
There is always someone...
remembering her.
89snowy.e2p3t001:
This is the world now...
The world belongs to humans.
The world without witches or magic...
89snowy.e2p3t002:
I never dreamed that...
I can see a witch again, and
tell the story about Irina...
89snowy.e2p3t003:
Irina's sister is still alive!
I'm...I'm her friend!
89snowy.e2p3t004:
Irina, and the hero...
Though they only exist
in fairy tales now...
89snowy.e2p3t005:
We are still here!
Magic hasn't disappeared...
89snowy.e2p3t006:
And you...you are living
near the village...
89snowy.e2p3t010:
Of course! \!Well...I still have
something very important to do...
If we can meet again some day...
89snowy.e2p3t012:
Emmm...How can I go back
to the village?
89snowy.e2p3t013:
I can take you back...
if you allow me...
89snowy.e2p3t015:
...You are welcome.\|
I lead them back even when humans
get lost in the forest...
89snowy.e2p4t001:
Maybe...
About two hundred years old.
89snowy.e2p4t002:
It's always snowing here...
I lost my sense of time.
89snowy.e2p4t003:
I was very young...
so was Irina.
We shouldn't have...
89snowy.e2p4t007:
I have nothing to ask...
if Irina's wishes can be granted...
89snowy.e2p4t009:
Irina would be happy to know that
you had been protecting the village
like this...
89snowy.e2p4t010:
After all...
it was what she was doing...
with her life.
89snowy.e2p4t011:
Yes...Therefore I'll be here...
Live, for Irina's sake.
89snowy.e2p4t013:
...To become an explorer, to know
more monsters and humans, and to
make more friends!
89snowy.e2p4t015:
............
It sounds like something
she would say...
